The parking spaces in front of the house are subject to a fee, but there is free parking in side streets, about a 3-5 minute walk from the apartment.
You can also use my cardio bike, as well as the balcony that is entered from my room.

Three of us live in the same building on the floors above (my wife Carola, me and our 16-year-old son Felix). On the ground floor we have our small architectural office.
From the central train station it's about 10 minutes by tram M10.

name: Kreuzberg 36, in the middle of!
description:
At the heart of Kreuzberg 36.
Large, quiet guest room (25qm, windows to the green backyard). Huge kitchen-living room for shared use.

Very good transport links: station "Kottbusser Tor" with U1, U3 (east-west), U8 (north-south), bus 140 in front of the door, the Landwehr Canal for walking and relaxing two blocks away, plus countless restaurants, bars, clubs, galleries within walking distance.

Kreuzberg is one of the most colorful, lively and for many the most interesting district in Berlin.

Since I am renting the flat out according to Berlin law I am obliged to only rent out under 50% of the flat - therefore the living room and my room are private ( They are also not shown in the pictures.)

City highway, S-Bahn station Westend and bus line M45 can be reached in a few minutes. Restaurants, cafes, bars, supermarkets, etc. as well.

description:

this is a friendly and easy-going accommodation in the trendy heart of Berlin (Prenzlauer Berg). My private room is big and cozy with a green balcony, in a huge maisonette that I share with my flatmate (a lady artist from Portugal). We have separate entrances on each floor, and share the kitchen and bathroom which are both quite spacious.

The place features a beautiful terrace on the garden, where guests can enjoy fresh air or a glass of wine while looking out at the complex’s courtyard .

description: My apartment is located in a typical Berliner Altbau building in the heart of the lively part of Neukölln. The style of the place is artsy and eclectic and I will be happy giving you some tipps for the neighborhood.

name: Willkommen in der kleinsten Bar Berlins.
description:

I'll leave you my room, probably the smallest bar in Berlin.
From here you can reach the Ostkreuz in three stations and it is in two stations in Neukölln. By bus you are in Kreuzberg in 15 minutes.
Spree and Plänterwald are within walking distance and worth a visit! Treptower Park is also close by.
Kitchen and bathroom can of course be shared. A washing machine is ready.
If you have any questions, just write to me!

The building is located in a green area surrounded by the urban and vibrant neighborhood of Kottbusser Tor, Kreuzberg.

The room itself provides a comfortable base for your stay. It's situated on a quiet street and is very clean and cozily furnished. A small bathroom and kitchen are exclusively available for your use, allowing you to feel right at home.

name: :Spacious room with balcony:Kreuzberg:Neukölln:
description: Dear guests, our nice shared flat is located in the district of Neukölln. We live in a typical, charming Berlin old house built in the 19th century with high ceilings and beautiful wooden floors and doors. Neukölln is a great urban and multicultural quarter with many cozy cafés and pretty bars. Hasenheide park, former Tempelhof airport and the canal in Kreuzberg are just round the corner as well as various supermarkets, foodmarkets and restaurants with delicious and affordable international food

name: Spacious bright flat for yourself
description: Spacious and luminous 100sqm Berlin apartment. I will be away so the whole flat is for you: 1 bedroom with a comfortable king size bed, a huge bathroom with a bathtub, the kitchen and the living room . Only the 2nd bedroom will be locked. The location is very convenient, close to public transportation (S-Bahn and buses) and at walking distance to lively area such as Kreuzberg and Neukölln. You can visit the Berlin Wall (East Side Gallery) in only 30 min by feet.

name: Perfect central location - bright, beautiful space
description:
If Berlin would have a real city center, Friedrichshain would be it! This apartment is close to Alexanderplatz, Warschauer Straße, the legendary RAW-Gelände & Simon-Dach-Straße with its' bars & restaurants.

The room is huge & you will have the kitchen & bathroom for yourself most of the time since I won't be at the apartment a lot during these days.

You’ll love the location, the ambiance, the brightness & the quietness even though you're right in the middle of everything.

name: Unique flat in beautiful Schillerkiez in Neukölln
description:
We renovated the whole space, will update photos!
Hello dear travelers,
We are very excited to welcome you in this stunning city we can call our own. Welcome to Berlin, welcome to Neukölln, welcome to Schillerkiez! Please feel free to settle down in one of the hippest areas in the city. Find bars, shops and the city center in walking distance. This is a colorful neighborhood full of young families and students. We are open to meet adventurers, couples, families etc! Feel free to ask us anything!

You want to stay very central, but a little away from all the touristic trouble and have a feeling for an authentic Berlin?

description:
Directly downtown: Gendarmenmarkt, Friedrichstraße and Checkpoint Charlie are very close. Alexanderplatz, Potsdamer Platz the Kreuzberg quarter are in close proximity to this room.
Central underground line (U2), Metro-Bus- and Tram connections are easy to reach. Both airports as well as the central station are accessible quickly and comfortably. A supermarked, bakery store and late-night shop with bicycle rental are close. Best suitable for couples, adventurers and business guests.

description: I offer the room with the Bed-Couch, which is very comfortable. Except the bathroom (without washing mashine) and the stove+sink there is no more furniture in the flat. That's why it's so cheap. It's perfect for staying overnight and seeing the city during the day. The apartement is right near U-Leinestraße. It's a quiet flat in the back of the house, but right in the middle of Schiller-Kiez, which is a really exciting neighborhood.

description:
Nice, bright room (lockable) with a large bed and a small wardrobe. Living room can be used together. Ideal for 1-2 people, even with a child. Vegetarian / vegan cuisine. The apartment is completely non-smoking. Smoking is allowed on the balcony. I don`t have pets.

Directly in the so-called Kreuzkölln, 1 km to the Sonnenallee, 1 km to Treptower Park & 1.5 km to Kreuzberg. 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz and the Friedrichstrasse by car or suburban train.

name: 1 Room in a sunny apartment in Friedrichshain
description: Our apartment (154qm) is a beautiful place in the heart of Friedrichshain which we love to share. Great location: close to bars, restaurants, parks and sights. Our kitchen is the most important part of the flat and awesome shared space with friendly Berliners (3 roommates) where you can also watch movies on the projector, listen to music, cook and hang out. The apartment is perfect for couples or people to explore.

name: Bright Cosy Room
description:
My accomodation is located in close proximity to the Tempelhofer Feld, other than that you can easily go to Kreuzberg / Mitte by Subway U6 within 10-15 minutes.

You'll love my flat / room 'cause of the nice calm athmosphere as a contrast to the fast pace of Berlin, the high sealings and the comfort of the room.

Perfect for couples or solo travelers.

(I changed the decoration in my room a little bit, nothing major, and it's still just as comfy.)

name: Studio Kreuzberg
description:
Very nice location , a private room with all necessary things that you need for a stay in Berlin.
The room has a private bathroom, private toilet, fridge, microwave, coffee machine, water heater, toaster and dishes. (No access to a kitchen).
The room has one big bed for two and one couch bed for one person.
The studio is for maximum 3 people.
The apartment has two floor, the studio is in first one and we live in the second. 8min walking from the public transport ,Location Kreuzberg.

name: Cozy room in East Berlin ideal for city break
description:
Private cozy room in the heart of East Berlin. On the border of Kreuzberg, close to East Side Gallery, river Spree, trendy area Friedrichshain with lots of Caffes, Clubs and Vintage shops. Easy access to famous Berlin landmarks. Next to famous business centers Allianz and Zalando. Treptower park is around the corner.

Room can be used for working space as well.

I am open for reservations in Corona time from now on. Appartement will be fully sanitised for you and disinfection provided.

name: 1 room facing East in Berlin (Moabit)
description:
Our flat is in multicultural Moabit. The underground station of Turmstraße is within 5 min., the central station within 10, Tegel airport within 15 bus min. Groceries (bio, super markets, Turkish, Asian), cafés and restaurants within walking distance.
We offer 1 bedroom (with a 1.40 bed and a balcony), kitchen, living room and loggia can be shared. You are free to cook meals as long as they don't contain animals.
We have two cats; the rooms are not suited for cat allergy sufferers.

name: Big, beautiful + good located apartment + balcony
description: huge and bright room full furnished in the 3rd floor of an old building, which is totally renovated. You have access to M4 Hufelandstraße directly in front of the house with 3 stops to Alexanderplatz. The flat is located in a beautiful area (Prenzlauer Berg) in the center of Berlin. Kitchen and Bathroom shared with one other person.

name: Cosy room in shared flat!
description: We are a filmmaker couple offering a nice, cosy room in our flat. The room is for maximum 4 people (1 to 2 people can sleep on the sofa bed and alternatively we have three mattresses for the floor). Also we have a huge hallway with a secret, cosy bunk bed where you can relax and read. We smoke in the kitchen at the window. You have your privacy of course but if you need us or want us to show you around arty Neukölln, we are there for you. All we ask for in return is for you to respect our home.

name: Dreamy big room in beautiful flat
description: We are renting a big, confortable, 21 m² room in the groundfloor of a beautiful neighbourhood in front of a river. We are offering a comfortable big private room, a clean bathroom and a complete kitchen with all utensils you can need. WLAN and basic things included. We are close to public transport, supermarkets, bakery and parks.  Send us a message telling about your visit in Berlin, we will be happy to welcome you here :)

Everything you want to explore is right outside the door of this property.

Moin dear travelers,

in the heart of Berlin Mitte is my small but nice apartment. It is only 3 minutes away from Alexanderplatz and therefore perfect for your Berlin trip (:

I offer a beautiful bright & cozy private room with a "double bed" of a slightly different kind, from there you have a wonderful view of the TV tower ~

Everything you need is within walking distance, it can't be more central!

Looking forward to seeing you (:

description: My 2-room apartment is located in the backyard of a nice quiet street and yet very central. Breakfast on the balcony, listening to a nice record or playing some guitar yourself. Anything possible with me. We share the apartment but it is likely that I will not be there during your stay. In the kitchen you can cook well and there is a lot to explore in the area. Restaurants, bars, clubs, cafes, nice shops, parks. The location is just fantastic.

name: Double Room with shared Bath&Kitchen/Potsdamer Pl.
description:
Everything you want to explore is right outside the door of this property.

The kitchen is fully equipped with a refrigerator, microwave and coffee machine. There is a stovetop and a toaster, as well as a kettle.

description:
This is a Private room, in a new fully renovated flat which located at the best neighborhood in Berlin, the heart of Kreuzberg. There is a U-bahn station in 1min walk, and plenty of Bars, Cafes and Restaurants.
The flat is in the back side of the building, so although it is on a main street,its very quiet.
You will share the flat with my great flatmate, he is super easy going person, and he also works as a tourist guide in the city, so you can ask him anything you want, and he will like to help.

description: The warmest home - especially for creative professionals, but not only! Here and in the neighborhood, you will breathe some special feeling of culture, music and art. It's an honest place, elegant in its simplicity, full of art and colors, with a big garden on the back. The flat is part of Gaswerksiedlung - one of the latest and most interesting complexes of creative studios in town - located slightly out the city's Ring, five minutes of walk away from Funkhaus Berlin.

To get to the Tempelhofer Feld you need 5 min.

Please note that drugs, smoking and partying is forbidden in the apartment. Shoes must be taken of at the entrance.

Busses, subways all located within a 5 min radius too!

description:

5 minutes walk from historic Berlin Wall / East Side Gallery and the Spree River. Bus Stop downstairs, 10 minutes walk from well-connected train station (both S-Bahn, U-Bahn), 1 stop from other major transport hubs (Ostbahnhof, Ostkreuz).

name: Zentral und dennoch ruhig am Boxi
description:
Welcome right in the heart of Friedrichshains
Quietly located in the back house, the room offers you a perfect starting point for tours of any kind. Culture and nature are not far away with all kinds of cafes, clubs, the Spree and the parks. And if you are still traveling far away, an ideal connection to the S-Bahn, tram and U-Bahn is guaranteed.

I myself also live in the apartment and we would share the kitchen and bathroom if I am there.

name: Spacious room in the heart of Berlin - Ostbahnhof!
description: In the heart of berlin, this room is conveniently located in Friedrichshain (1 minute walk from Ostbahnhof station). The room newly renovated, is extremely spacious and quite bright all day long! Its perfect for singles and couples, though can also accommodate a small child on the comfy sofa. The house has all the required amenities, including a washing machine, dishwasher, fridge, iron, etc. I will be hosting you in this house and will happily tend to any of your queries.

name: Bright design room at hip Boxi in Friedrichshain
description: Sleep, work, relax, eat! Enjoy a beautiful super centrally located space in trendy Friedrichshain - for couples or women till 01.01. after this women only :) as my roommate is a nice, calm woman.  Enjoy 2 Balconies and 200meters to Boxhagener Platz - food market on Saturday and the famous fleamarket on Sundays, a lot of amazing Cafes and Restaurants just 1 minute away :) Public transport in 50m walk „Samariter Str“ tram access U 5 with direct connection to the main train station in 20minutes

name: Pure  & Spacious Zen room in Neukölln Center
description:
Central Neukölln, super convenient and international area. This is Berlin's most hip and most cosmopolitan area.

Subway and a shopping center are in a minute. Cafes are everywhere and there are famous big parks for jogging, beautiful canals, big flea market, vintage second hand shops, movie theaters in walking distance.

It is very central yet in a quiet neighborhood.

Check in time could be sometimes negotiable. Please ask!

I am a pretty quite person, but I can help you if you need anything, give you hints, where to go or show you nice places. The room is pretty big and directed to the inner courtyard.

name: ZIMMER IM HERZEN VON NEUKÖLLN
description:
It is a approx. 70 sqm apartment and has 2 rooms of which I offer one (approx. 23 sqm).
The apartment has a kitchen with an electric stove and there is a shower and a washing machine. I have 2 mattresses as well as a sofa bed.

name: Wohnen auf Zeit- Bergmannkiez
description: You can't live more centrally in Berlin. The property is within walking distance of Potsdamer Platz, Unter den Linden and Bergmannstraße - the Ku'damm of Kreuzberg. In a few minutes you can reach the main underground stations that run throughout the city. Rents for a long-term stay up to 6 weeks max.

name: Room for two in center Berlin
description: Cozy for 2 pax, located in central Berlin 10 minutes from Brandenburg gate, High ceilings, and wooden floors

name: Quiet Room in Charlottenburg
description:
A quiet place in the big town! A sweet flat in the remise-building (backyard) with french balcony, american kitchen and bathtub.
Very close to the U-Bahn and Buses, short distance to Tegel airport and ten minutes walk to Charlottenburger Schloss.

name: Zimmer in Berlin-Neukölln
description: Cozy and stylishly furnished room in the heart of the Neukölln. Within walking distance you are on the Weserstraße which, in addition to beautiful cafes and trendy bars, you have unusual vintage shops and restaurants to offer both the small and the big price. A bus stop as well as a supermarket are right outside the door.

name: 22m2 Big sunny room with balcony in Berlin wedding
description:
Big room in Berlin wedding, ideal for young people. In the area are many bars, clubs and also a lake, where you can swim in the hot days !
The metro U9 ist just 2 minutes walking from the apartment so you can reach the zoo in less than 15 minutes. Also the lines U8 (to Kreuzberg) and U6 are quite near.

name: beautiful room with balcony in Kreuzberg
Gemütliches 22qm Zimmer in Schöneberg mit Balkon
description: My place is close to the S Friedenau. You can shop well here and everything necessary is within walking distance! The apartment has very nice high ceilings, nice people, a good location, and lots of coziness. My accommodation is nice for couples, solo adventurers and furry friends (pets) and also ideal for young people.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer in Pankow
description:
Welcome to your cozy retreat for your stay in Berlin. We are a 3er women's apartment in the beautiful and green district of Pankow.
In your spacious and lovingly furnished room there is a sofa bed, a desk with chair, a mirror, a clothes rail with hangers and opaque curtains. Linens and towels are furnished. The room is facing the street and is nicely bright through the large windows.
The kitchen and bathroom are shared with us.

name: Beautiful place@Alexanderplatz
description:
In Mitte, 5 min walk to Alexanderplatz and nice view of the TV tower! The beautiful big room comes with one big queen sized bed and one person bed.
Feel free to contact! :)

name: Stylish room in center of hip Berlin Kreuzberg
description:
This listing is only for long-term rentals with a notice period of 3 months. Ein unbefristeter Wohnraummietvertrag wird abgeschlossen.

LOCATION:
The room is located in a very beautiful building in the middle of the hip Berlin district Kreuzberg close to Berlin Mitte. The underground station Kottbusser Tor can be reached by foot within few minutes. It is the hotspot for charming cafes, bars and restaurants that serve specialities from all over the world.

name: Altbauwohnung P-Berg mit Balkon.
description:
Room in an old building in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Hotspots such as Mauerpark, Schönhauser Allee, etc. within walking distance.
The apartment is minimalist and slightly Asian furnished.

Room in an old building apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Hotspots like Mauerpark, Schönhauser Allee, etc. within walking distance.
The apartment is minimalist and slightly Asian-inspired furnished.

name: Großes Zimmer in wundervoller WG
description:
I am on vacation for a good two weeks and my room in a wonderful shared apartment is available!
You would live with three nice people in a 136 sqm apartment, have a large bathroom and an even larger kitchen (with a stove, microwave, dishwasher, etc.) and a approx. 27 sqm room just for you. Here you will find a desk, cabinets, plenty of space and private balcony!
The connection to the city is great, otherwise it is quiet and relaxed with us:)

name: Mitten drin und ruhig in Friedrichshain
description: My cozy private room offers you the perfect blend of rest and entertainment. Surrounded by lively Friedrichshain, concerts, bars and restaurants are very close. Public transit is available 24/7 to explore the city. Your room offers an oasis of tranquility where you can relax and unwind. Whether you want to take a park walk or immerse yourself in Berlin's nightlife, here you will find everything.

name: Tower Suite im Hotel Oderberger nähe Mauerpark
description:
The Oderberger is a listed former city bathroom in Berlin Prenzlauer - it opened in 2016 as a boutique hotel with 70 rooms, two apartments and 5 tower rooms as well as a fireplace bar.
Highlight is the historic swimming pool, please refer to our website for opening hours.
Hotel Oderberger Berlin is located in the popular and trendy trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg on the border of Berlin Mitte, just a 5-minute walk to the Mauerpark!

name: Central spot in the heart & bikes for rent
description: This room category with approx. 15m² has 2 single beds standing together (at least 90x200 cm each), a workplace and a flat screen TV with cable TV. Our bathrooms are equipped with shower, hairdryer, as well as hand and shower soap. The location is perfect for those who like a  quiet retreat during their city stay – but don't worry: the best restaurants are just a few stops on the bus or a nice walk away!

name: Big bright room in very green area
description:
Large bright 35m2 room in a beautiful, 3rd floor apartment. The room has high ceilings, stuk, and hardwood floors. Provided with a double bed and the option of a single bed if needed.

LOCATION:
2 minutes from S-Bahn station Bundesplatz, which connects to the Ringbahn, so very efficient for getting around the city. U-Bahn U9 is 2 min walk away, and U7 is around the corner.
Next to Volkspark Wilmersdorf and many options for grocery shopping nearby, both bio and regular supermarkets.

name: Comfortable Private Rooms Gesundbrunnen
description:
Small bedroom and spacious work/livingroom, private for the guest.

Kitchen and bathroom are shared with the owner of the apartment.

Located near Humboldthain park and Gesundbrunnen, closest public transport: U8 and U9.

The are is calm, but has lovely restaurants, venues and parks, if you know where to find them. The host can share the local tips with you.

name: Cozy room in spacious flat with kitten
description:
One bedrooom and a big shared living room. / You have one bedroom. We share a big bright living room.

Our spacious 140sqm flat is cozy, with high walls and a fabulous 180 degree view on the streets of Neukölln. / In our living room is the most exciting movie - half the world on a street. In the middle of Neukölln, opposite two relaxed bars, a cozy cafe, very close art and good restaurants.

We have a cat. / There is one Katze.

name: Cosy near WISTA & HU-campus Adlershof
description:
Friendly 17sqm room in a modern house in a quiet, green area. Walking distance to institutes of Humboldt-university, resaerch institutes, companies and TV-studios on WISTA-Campus Adlershof.

15min by car / 40 min by public transport from BER. Approximately 55 min to tourist places downtown by public transport.

You have your own fridge, a cooking plate and a microwave in your room and you can use the dishwasher in my kitchen. (No shared kitchen.)

name: In the HEARTHEART of Berlin
description:
Hello,
You want to live in the center of Berlin closed to AlexanderPlatz, HU and the Museums Island with bars, shops and galleries around? Then you re welcome to live in my flat!!

name: Cozy room in best district! : P
description:
My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. Cozy room at the Ostkreuz between About Blank and Wilde Renate and very good S-Bahn connection.

Please be aware that it is smoker flat, but only in the kitchen is allowed to smoke and not in the rooms. :)

name: Sunny rooftop, perfectly located :)
description:
Hey therer :),
i'm offering here a privat-room in my sunny flat in Berlin-City.
It is located in Friedrichshain, a very famous part of Berlin with a lot of Bars and Nightclubs to go out at night.

As this is where i'm living, we will share that apartment during your stay, but this should be no issue. I'm happy to help with a lot good recommendations. :)

name: Next to U8/U7 - Top Floor Quiet Backyard Room
description:
The very well-located Altbau flat is totally newly renovated in a charming well maintained old building, it has a balcony, a bathtub, and an underfloor heating system.
The room offers you a very quiet and relaxing sleep. Even with the vivid location, the flat is facing a quiet courtyard with a very pleasant atmosphere.

name: Großes Zimmer mit Arbeitsplatz in Berlin-Mitte
description:
Welcome to Berlin. From my central yet quiet apartment in Berlin's Moabit neighborhood, you can reach all the important places of Berlin in a short time:

10 minutes walk to the subway stations Turmstraße and Birkenstraße and from there after 2 - 3 stops in the City Center West (Zoologischer Garten with Kurfürstendamm).

Also 10 minutes to tram stop of the M10, which goes directly to the main train station.

Various bus lines can also be reached in the nearby Turmstraße.

name: Big room, bright&calm, XKölln
description:
Be welcome in our lovely Maisonette apartment in Xkölln. It is located in the 4th&5th floor of a nice backyard, so its bright and calm. There is everything you need to enjoy a real home :))

Your space would be the upper floor (open salon + bedroom). In the lower floor you share the kitchen and bathroom with the wonderful Susanne, she is working at the Berlinale on a 9-5 schedule.

This is a 'real' home and flat-share and not an holiday apartment <3

Let us know if you have any question,

Ben

name: The heart of Kreuzberg, right next to Viktoriapark
description: It’s in the heart of the famous neighborhood Kreuzberg near the lovely Viktoriapark. It’s 8 minutes walking from the U6/U7 U-Bahn station Mehringdamm.

name: Helles Zimmer in Moabit in 2er Wg
description: I rent out my spacious, relaxed, bright room in a shared apartment of 2 in Berlin, Moabit. The apartment is very centrally located and offers direct connections to the subway and bus. Kitchen and bathroom are on site. In the room there is a double bed and a desk for use.

name: simple and practical room
description: Hey people, I am renting out the room of me and my boyfriend. It is right by the U-bahn station Samariterstraße, it is on the 4.th floor in a flaat with a balcony. There are 4 possibly 5 other people living in the apartment in separate rooms. If you are interested in experiencing the nightlife of Berlin, this apartment lies to foot 10 minutes away from Revalerstraße and Warschauerstraße (where you find quite some Berlin clubs). And from the U-bahn station under you can easily go into centrum.

name: Nice room in beautiful apartment
description: You'll stay in my cozy guestroom. The apartment is only 10 minutes by public transport from Alexanderplatz, Warschauer Strasse or Prenzlauer Berg.

name: Hotel Comenius - Twin room
description: Twin Room: For travelers who prefer separate beds, our Twin Rooms offer the ideal solution. Enjoy the comfort of two single beds and spend a pleasant night in our hotel.

name: ParadieserMansion
description: We offer you one nice and modern 15sqm room in the south of Neukölln! Feel free to enjoy the spirit of summary Berlin in one of the most authentic areas of the German capitol - we are sure that you will like it here!

name: Cosy room in nice Neighborhood
description:
The apartement is located in the lovley "Wrangelkiez". You will find plenty of good restaurants, bars and coffee shops around the corner.
You will share the apartement with my nice flatmades, but you will have enough private space in your room.

name: Cosy room with piano&private bathroom-top location
description:
Discover and enjoy Berlin from the very heart of the city, directly at Checkpoint Charlie! Our modern flat is situated between Potsdamer Platz and Alexander Platz. With U2/U6 (Station Stadtmitte) almost in front of the door, you can reach the main historical and cultural attractions in the center of Berlin within few minutes, even by foot.
Our room (15 m2) is fully equipped with a double bed, mattress on the floor, bed clothes, fridge, private bathroom with shower, hairdryer and towels, balcony.

name: coolest u can get -bike included
description:
Hey there,
I hope you doing great! I am a film director from Berlin. Me and my friend Anna a programmer just moved in an beautiful apt. in the heart of area Tempelhof. I am off for work and rent out my comfortable room. The huge 190sqm flat (3 balconies, 2 bathrooms) is perfect for couples and individuals. My new home is surrounded by culinary (good or valued!) restaurants and 10 min subway ride from most hip bars of Kreuzberg. Looking forward to have you!

name: Private room, bath and desk located at Schlosspark
description:
Private room with cozy double bed, workspace and private bathroom in the immediate vicinity of the Niederschönhausen Castle Park.

In the neighborhood there are supermarkets (REWE, Edeka, Aldi, Netto), as well as various restaurants and also takeaways.

Good transport links with stops of the M1, 250 and 150 lines. The S&U Pankow train station is 20 minutes walk through the castle park.

name: For women: Room in Rooftop Penthouse
description: A spacious Scandinavian styled gem in the heart of bustling Berlin-Mitte. The highlight of the apartment is its rooftop, humorously called the "heliport," where you can unwind, exercise, or dine. The apartment comprises a bedroom, living room, fully equipped kitchen, and bathroom.

name: Big Room in great Location
description:
From this centrally located accommodation, you are in all important places in no time at all.

The popular Ringbahn (S-Bahn), as well as the central subway line U6 are a 5-minute walk from The apartment, as well as the huge Tempelhofer Feld, where you can skate jog, grill or simply enjoy the beautiful weather.

name: Quite room in hip area
description:
In our nice, quite apartment it is easy to relax. Your room is located to the calm backyard. Also you have access to the 40 m² living kitchen with a balcony.
Friedrichshain is on of the best districts of Berlin with plenty of bars, restaurants and clubs.

name: Privat room only 15 min. away from Alexanderplatz
description: I live in a brand new apartment in the beautiful Weissensee district on the border to the scene districts Prenzlauer Berg. Some small restaurant are just a 5-10 minute walk away. A supermarket and a bakery are located just one minute away. The station is just a minute walk from the doorstep. from here Alexanderplatz is only 15 minutes away.

name: Zimmer mit Terrasse im schönen Kaskelkiez
description: This is the place to be if you are looking for a place to relax and from where you can quickly get to the city center. You have your own room and you also have bathroom, kitchen and terrace mostly to yourself, because I usually rent out when I travel myself.

name: 22m² Zimmer im schönen Prenzlauer Berg
description:
The apartment is in the very trendy and beautiful neighborhood of Prenzlauer Berg. The room is 22m² big big

It is also very good to the public. Transportation connected. 1 min to the tram, 7 min to subway & S-Bahn. In 20 minutes you are already in the government district, and in 30 minutes in Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain.

Cafes, bars, restaurants, supermarkets and bakeries - everything is in the immediate vicinity and within walking distance.

Looking forward to seeing you soon :-)

name: Charmante Altbauwohnung mit Balkon in Kreuzberg
description:
Charming, furnished 60 sqm old building apartment with balcony in Kreuzberg for rent temporarily

Completely renovated and fully furnished old building apartment is for rent for at least 3 months. Longer period is also possible.

1 bedroom, 1 bathroom with shower, large living room with balcony (south facing) and separate kitchen. Very peaceful to the courtyard.
Wood floors, exposed masonry, and furnished with mid-century,vintage furnishings, and Smeg gas stove.

name: Urige Altbauwohnung mitten in Berlin
description: Cool room including a private bathroom and kitchen close to the city center. (Alexanderplatz is just 10 minutes away.) The apartment is still really calming and quite. The area is super nice with lots of cafés, restaurants, small shops, etc.  Just 5 walking minutes away is a huge park (called Volkspark Friedrichshain). Since we rent the room when we‘re out of city it’s really likely you‘ll have the entire apartment for yourself. We are still always there to help and support you if needed.

name: Zimmer #1 - Einzelzimmer Hotel Bregenz
description: Our hotel is located in the center of West Berlin. You need a few minutes to walk to Ku 'damm. During your stay here you will come and enjoy the charm of the old apartments of Berlin.
property_type: Private room in bed and breakfast

name: Meine Wohnung, mein Kiez - kinderfreundlich!
description:
Hello! We (freshly baked parents) have already been on the road through Airbnb ourselves, but are now renting for the first time. We hope you do not shy away from the risk of the first visit, as we offer you a great old apartment in the middle of beautiful Friedrichshain. Child-friendly, of course.

The apartment includes a large living room in addition to hallway, kitchen and bathroom (incl. Sofa bed) and one spacious bedroom (incl. Double bed and cribs).

name: Awesome room right in the heart of Berlin!
description: Hey guys, I've been using airbnb for years to travel the world and also offer a room in my apartment to host some fellow travelers :) My place could literally not be more central. It's right on Hackescher Markt, one of the hip spots in Berlin Mitte. We got tons of cafes and bars around as well as the famous Isle of Museums - which is in 3 minutes walking distance. Essentially everything is really close by and easy to reach. Public transport is 1 min away, supermarkets are also close by!

name: Spacious room in lovely flatshare
description: My room is 20m² and decorated in a retro chic style. Light fills the room during the day due to two big windows. The neighborhood is quite but within a short walking distance you have a wonderful selection of restaurants, cafes, and bars.

name: 2 schöne, große,helle Zimmer
description:
Since we travel a lot, we offer 2 very nice, large guest rooms.
There is everything you need-as complete amenities, and a lot more beautiful:balcony and a great fireplace! Price is per room (2 rooms with two beds).

name: House of nation, Brunnenstraße
description: Ubhan and sbhan stations are walkable distance and only two stops away from Alexander platz

name: Standard Doppelbett-Zimmer
description:
Short nights and long days? We offer you our standard double bed room for this!

With a hotel room, you have the functionality and well-being? Then this is the place for you!

name: Zimmer im Herzen Friedrichshains
description: I rent out my 17 sqm room in the heart of Friedrichshain. The room is furnished with a sofa bed, desk, wardrobe, dresser and coffee table. A TV can be provided on request.

name: Large room in central Berlin
description:
Private living room in very central Berlin-Friedrichshain (Simon-Dach area), perfectly connected with S-Bahn and U-Bahn (Warschauerstr.).

My sofa will be equipped as bed with fresh linen, duvet and pillow.

The apartment is located at the third floor (no elevator available)

name: Zentrales, helles Zimmer
description:
Furnished 10 sqm room in a nice shared apartment centrally located at Gesundbrunnen train station.
Great luminous room room in a maisonette apartment with garden.
The garden is available for use. Bathroom with bathtub and kitchen are available at your disposal.

name: Cosy Room in Neukölln * Weserkiez
description: We are 3 people, living in the famous Weserkiez. Feel welcome and use our stay for a lovely time in Berlin.

name: Charmantes Zimmer in Altbauwohnung Nähe Ku'damm
description:
- From the 3rd till the 11th of September "room1" is for rent -

Beautiful room in old building apartment with floorboards and stucco 3 minutes walk to Kurfürstendamm, U-Bahn station Adenauerplatz and S-Bahn station Charlottenburg. Lovingly furnished with everything needed. There are also 2 rabbits living in the apartment and I will also be there as I also live in the apartment. We can chat but if you do not want to, it does not have to be :).

name: Small Room between Potsdam and Berlin
Tiny, individual Room with private Bathroom
description: We offer a welldone, individual Guestroom with a private Toilette and Shower. The room is calm and cosy. Near the entrance and a little bit away from the rest of the apartment you can feel really private. In the room you will find everything you need for your relaxed and interesting business oder holiday time in berlin.

name: Light & cozy living in Neukoelln
description:
The flat is located in NEUKÖLLN, one of the most popular areas in Berlin!
Why? Because it's ideal for so many life styles. For travellers, it's attractive too, because it suits both, the relaxed stay and the wild stay. In the following, I will give you some advice to parks, coffee places, cinemas, clubs and bars, too. But also some hints on where you got your basics from. Whenever you got questions, my lovely flat mates will be staying with you. Or you can just contact me whenever you want to!

name: Privatzimmer im Berliner Altbau - tolle Anbindung
description:
Hello friends,

I live in a 1.5-room old building apartment. One of the rooms is available to you as a private guest bedroom. The bed is 120x200 cm.

I am not in the apartment during that time, so privacy is taken care of

The bathroom, equipped with a shower and a washing machine, is just as welcome as you can use my kitchen with all the utensils.

Looking forward to seeing you :)

Best regards
Marco

name: Bright,warm room directly at Görlitzerpark
description:
My room is located in the Wrangel-kiez, direktly at Görlitzerpark. The room catches alot of light all day long so it has a very warm and welcoming atmosphere and also a very enjoyable view on to the Park. The surrounding area is filled with little Cafes, Bars, Resturants. From here it is also easy to reach many of the Infamous clubs Berlin has to offer.


Trainstation is Schlesisches Tor (U1 + U3)

name: Renovierte Altbauwohnung (Zimmer) in Neukölln
description: The apartment is in the heart of Rixdorf, one of the hippest districts of Berlin. Around the corner is the S-Bahn and U-Bhf Neukölln, which gives a perfect connection to the city center, Kreuzberg and Friedrichshain. There are many nice pubs, cafes and small shops around the Apartment. The apartment is a beautiful Berlin old building with high ceilings. The room goes south and has its own balcony. The room is suitable for couples as well as solo travelers.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer in Neukölln
description:
The quiet 23 sqm room with futon, clothes rail, sitting area and desk is in the heart of Neukölln. Short distances to the Ringbahn (Sonnenallee), subway (u7-Karl-Marx-Strasse) and various shops of daily use.

The kitchen-living room of the apartment is perfectly equipped for cooking and offers everything necessary to conjure up something delicious. It also offers plenty of space to sit together.

Wi-Fi and washing machine are of course also available.

name: The Heart of Berlin
description:
I am offering an elegant and quiet Room located in Berlins P-berg/f-hain. The apartment features a lovely bathroom, a new and fully equipped kitchen, a very big sunny living room and a balcony.
The apartment is very well served by public transport.

name: Cozy "Altbau"-room in Berlin-Friedenau
description:
Beautiful, calm and clean room with a lot of morning sun coming in. The room is part of our big Altbau flat in the so called "Malerviertel" of Berlin-Friedenau/Schöneberg.

Your room has high stucco ceilings, typical batten floor and a cozy vintage style furnishing. It is located to a calm backyard with a big green chessnut tree. The perfect place to relax after a long sightseeing tour...

name: Cosy, bright top floor room
description:
I am letting my room in our beautiful top floor flat!

The room is spacious and accommodates 1 person.

The flat is the ideal, cosy base if you're after an authentic visit to Berlin. You'll be sharing the apartment with my lovely flat mate.

name: Huge & Cozy Room in the Heart of Friedrichshain
description: The room is located in one of Berlin's coolest hoods, with everything you need steps away including transportation which is a few minutes away from our door. One of us is from Berlin and the other has lived here for more than three years now, so we know it all. We would love to host you and give you a nice list of things to do and not just in the neighbourhood. You have access to our fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Drop us a message if you have any questions.

name: Familienzimmer
description: A trip with best friends or family to Berlin? Check in with us!

name: Zwei schöne Zimmer in Altbauwohnung Kreuzberg
description: Beautiful old building with very high ceilings and wooden floorboards. The apartment is located right next to the Kreuzberg (Möckernstr.), is 120 square meters and the two rooms together are 36 square meters. Next to me, my very nice, relaxed roommate live here.

name: Big, bright and cozy Room in Friedrichshain
description:
Hello! My room in Berlin Friedrichshain has a balcony, TV (with Netflix) and a double bed. I am currently rennovating, thats why there are several pictures from before and now.
Since I have a roommate, kitchen and bathroom have to be shared.
The apartment is located in Friedrichshain. Connection is great! S- Storkowerstr. / U- Samariterstraße is around the corner.
There are bars and cafés close to my place. If you need any recommendations you will find them on the table or you can ask me :)

name: Familienzimmer für 4 Personen
description:
Welcome to Hotel Bohemia!

Discover the vibrant atmosphere of the up-and-coming Neukölln district with its diverse cafes and restaurants.

Our central location near S-Bahn and U-Bahn stations allows for easy exploration of the surrounding cultural hotspots.

Enjoy the convenience of complimentary Wi-Fi during your stay.

Luggage storage is available during reception hours.

We look forward to your visit!

Listing address: Karl-Marx-Straße 262, 12057, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Ecocoliving Cosy & Calm Room south of Berlin
description:
Cosy Room in Calm Place, Fast Train to Downtown!:)
Apartment is located 8 min walk from city train (S-Bahn)/regional Train station "Lichterfelde Ost", a green south berlin locality. Shopping mall and supermarkets in 4 min walk. From our apartment to city centre takes 15 mins by train (by day*). *By NIGHT (1-4am) only bus is running, count 1 hour to come back home! Check out time: 12AM. Time can be Flexible (please ask me directly). No Music after 10:30PM, no smoking and No Party!

name: Room in quiet and clean flat above Tiergarten
description:
1 private bedroom (comfortable thicker matress on the floor of larger size) for one person or a couple who do not mind sharing.
It is also possible to sleep on a fairly comfortable couch in the living room if you are more people.
The room is in a beautiful big flat in Moabit, just above Tiergarten. Clean and as newly renovated. Queer friendly and open minded.
You will share the flat with one person.
Connections are good, close to u-bahn and ringbahn.

name: Paradiso Comfy Room 4 the Special You Top Location
description: For the Special You in the Mitte Top Central Special Room (with comfy medical mattress, clothing racks and drawers, sofa, desk and all that jazz) in the past it happily accommodated artists, grad students and independents alike it has wooden laminated floors and white walls it has almost 3,5 meters high ceiling and its really big window faces the famous post card Berlin TV Tower which is 5m away super romantic view at night plus during the day its filled with Sun all day long a true Paradiso :)

name: Big Room in a Shared Apartment - Treptowerpark
description: Big  Room in a Shared Apartment

name: Schöne Altbauwohnung am Hohenzollernplatz
description:
GUESTS ARE USUALLY ALONE IN THE APARTMENT.
GUESTS ARE USUALLY ALONE IN THE FLAT.

A beautiful old building apartment with 4m high ceilings, large windows and love of detail. Due to the location to the back courtyard very nicely quiet with a friendly neighborhood. The kitchen-living room is fully equipped with a stove, oven, refrigerator, water cooker and toaster. In the bathroom there is a monsoon shower, washing machine, dryer and hair dryer. Towels and soap are also available.

name: Lovely room with backyard -Amazing location
description: Enjoy Berlin in the heart of Neukölln, the city's most vibrant and diverse neighbourhood. The room is in a shared flat. Which is new and very comfortable with direct access to the backyard. High speed internet, smart TV, washing/drying machine and all necessary amenities are provided. Only 3 minutes by foot to the S-Bahn Neukölln, and 2 subway stations (U7 & U8)-  the best connected lines. You can rest assured that I will host you with the highest sanitary and Covid prevention standards.

name: Quiet Room in Green Area
description: Enjoy your stylish experience in my centrally located home. My apartment is located between  great parks(Körnerpark and Tempelhofer Feld). In front of the house there is free parking should not be found, then there are still many side roads. The accommodation is super easy to reach, as the U8, U7, S42 is right outside the front door. Perfect for your city trip to Berlin.

name: Huge Room in Shared Flat: Large Bed, Sofa, Terrace
license:
First name and Last name: Martin Kreienbaum
Contact address: Krausnickstraße 5, 10115, Berlin, Berlin
Listing address: Krausnickstr. 5, 10115, Berlin, Berlin

name: In the Heart of Neukölln, next to Griesmühle
description: Our home is located in Neukölln, 5 minutes walk away from the sbahn station Sonnenallee. The „ring/Ringbahn“ runs onetime around the center of Berlin, so you are good connected. The supermarket on the otherside of the street and Spätis are close bye. The Späti called Ak44 is 24/7 opend the other ones almost. You got nice bars around the corner within walking distance, especially in the Richardkiez. The well known club Griesmühle you can also walk to within 5 min.

name: Centrally located Flat near Warschauer Brücke
description: My flat is conveniently located in the heart of Friedrichshain close to major transport hubs (Warschauer Strasse S/U Bahn, Bus and Tram).  The area is known for its restaurants and bars and of course Clubs. The East Side Mall is in walking distance of 10 min. The flat is on the 4th floor in a typical berlin old style building complete with exposed brickwork, high ceilings, wooden floors and all the comforts of a modernised home.

name: Room in a sunny, modern apartment
description:
The room is ideally located to explore the city: in the historical centre of Berlin, right next to an urban railway and subway station.

The room is sunny. It is on the 11th floor, and there is an elevator.

I live alone in the apartment and share the bathroom with the guest.

Please note: Currently there are construction works nearby. With closed windows this should bo no problem, but with open windows it can be noisy.

name: Lovely and spacious guest room in Kreuzberg
description: Welcome to Berlin! I've decided to rent out my lovely, spacious and functional guest room to visitors from all over the world. The room is ideal for you if you're planning to stay anything from 5 days to 3 months and I can help you get set up in Berlin easily. Or I can leave you alone :) The flat is in a very popular area between Görlitzer Park and Landwehrkanal, clean, and will hopefully provide you with the perfect Berlin experience!

name: private room, cosy & super central
description:
This is a single room (22m²) in cute nice apartment (65m²) in the hearth of Berlin.
It is part of the charming Charlottenburg area of Berlin, with lots of places for entertainment, culture and night life & relaxing.

name: Zimmer in Familienhaus mit Garten und Kater
description:
small cozy house with plank floor and garden, a cat and two children (8 and 13 years old).

The location is extremely quiet, but with the public transport you are still super connected and get quickly to the center or where you want to go.

Just around the corner, the Plänterwald starts, if you like jogging or need a little rest after all the city impressions, you will enjoy it there.

The nearest shopping area is 2 minutes away.

name: Private room in Kreuzberg Bergmannkiez. Top.
description:
Spacious furnished room in a beautiful old building in the listed part of the Bergmannkiez. The eat-in kitchen is new and equipped with brand-name appliances.
One room is already rented, the bathroom is shared.
We are a small family with a friendly dog, and are moving to Berlin in the summer. Until then, we won't be in the apartment much, but you shouldn't be allergic to dogs or afraid of them.

name: Big room in middle of beautiful Tempelhof
description:
Hello dear travelers!

In our wonderful shared apartment, a room is occasionally available.
In the room is a double bed and a fold-out sofa. The apartment is located directly on the U6 and not far from the Ringbahn. There are countless shopping opportunities. I am also on site with tips and can also come and pick you up (with the public transport). You can use all rooms, the kitchen invites you warmly! My room is very lovingly designed. Just ask if the room is available:)

name: Quiet room in a house, close to FU and metro
description:
It's a quiet, residential neighborhood in the south-west of Berlin with a lot of green.

Within 10 mins of walking are 3 different metro lines and a dozen bus lines (closest 4 mins)
You have a good connection to the city center, usually without having to change.

There are also many Supermarkets and restaurants within 10 mins of walking, as well as one of the biggest shopping streets in Berlin (Schloßstraße).

We also have a guest bike which you can use freely.

name: Calm room in the heart of Neukölln (women only)
description: Hi there! I'm renting out my room in my spacious and lovely 85 square meter apartment in Berlin while I'm traveling. It's right in the heart of Neukölln, close to Hermannplatz, but the room is really quiet with no street noise, so you can enjoy a peaceful stay.

name: great apartment in kreuzkölln
description: clean and comfortable house in a quite building with internal garden. cheap and alive suburb,with many bars and restaurants.walking distance from the canal(türkischMarkt) and lots of parks. few minutes to metro Hermannplatz and several bus stops!

name: Zimmer mit schönem Sonnenuntergang in Berlin.
description: Hi, beautiful room with fantastic sunset in Prenzlauer Berg, restaurants,cafes, combining shopping with a leisurely walk through the neighborhood or by S-Bahn and tram right nearby to keep the city under control day and night.

name: gemütliches Zimmer mit Balkon
description: Bright room in a shared apartment with a balcony, 5 minutes away are two beautiful parks,as well as shopping facilities are within walking  distance.

name: A Zone, near Zoo(10Min) Zob(10Min) Tegel(15Min).
description:
Our house is very close to Charlottenburg and Wilmersdorf.

There is a market in front of the house.

Even ZOB can be reached at the bus stop in front of the house at once (about 10 minutes).

It takes about 15 minutes to get to the Airport Tegel. Traffic center!

S-bahn, U-Bahn is also very good.
It's a house that's all renovated.

name: Green Oasis Next to Mauerpark (Altbau)
description:
Bright and cosy Altbau flat in the middle of Berlin, which you will have entirely to yourself.
Quite flat with wooden floors, huge balcony with a view of the TV tower and Zionskirche, bathtub, kitchen with amenities make this a perfect place to explore Berlin. The flat is located centrally, with a vicinity of restaurants, cafes and bars nearby just a few minutes away from some of Berlin’s hotspots like Mauerpark and Kastanienallee, as well as Mitte district.

name: Cute room in trendy Neukölln
description:
This cosy, light filled room is perfect one, or for two! With a large comfy bed, a working desk, as well as a sofa, this room is ideal for putting your feet up after a long day of sightseeing! It is the quietest room in the house.

In a very central location, 3 mins walk from Neukölln U-Bahn and S-Bahn train station. There are an abundance of grocery stores, cafes, hip bars, parks, and a variety of eateries all within walking distance of the apartment.

name: Spacious flat in between Mitte & Friedrichshain
description: Right down the street from Friedrichshain Park, quiet neighborhood, geographically smack in the middle between Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg, Friedrichshain & Kreuzberg. Located across from a cemetery, so the view is pretty and calm. It's a 5 minute bike ride into Friedrichshain and ten minutes by bike to Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg & Kreuzberg. If you're musically inclined there is an electric piano, ukuleles, and an Irish harp to play. Great for couples and solo travellers.

name: Nice room | Spacious flat | Top area
description:
Welcome to our nice flat in the center of Berlin (Mitte). It's located near several public transport stations. You have immediate access to Subway, Tram and Bus station "Rosenthaler Platz". The flat is fully furnished. You have easy access to shops, supermarkets, bars and galleries. A lot of sightseeing spots are in walking distance.
You may use the kitchen, the bathroom, the living room and the balcony and all the equipment in our flat.

name: The Sunny Tree Room - Silent and Bright
description: This is a quiet, old-Berlin style room with wooden floors and high ceilings. The windows face the street, but when they are closed you have absolute silence. You also have a glazed balcony for your own. The ~20qm room is in a 4 room 95qm apartment where I live with my partner.

name: Sunny Top Floor Stylish Bedroom in  Neükolln
description: 17m2 bedroom in a very sunny top floor 56m2 apartment with balcony in Neukölln/Kreuzkölln (the overlap of Kreuzberg and Neukölln), one block from the canal, in a quiet and residential area but very close to restaurants and bars. This flat is my safe place.

name: Single room-Standard-Shared Bathroom
description:
WELCOME TO THE AMAYA MOTEL
Feel at home with us, in a relaxed atmosphere and stylishly furnished rooms.
The Amaya Motel is located in exciting Neukölln - Berlin's trendiest district par excellence.
Here you are directly at the pulse of the city and yet you will find a quiet retreat to relax.
We are looking forward to you !
license:
First name and Last name: Anas Goranov
Contact address: Walterstraße 9, 12051, Berlin, Deutschland
Listing address: Silbersteinstraße 5-7, 12051, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Urban Oasis in the Bergmannkiez
description: Our place is a fully modernised 'Altbauwohnung' in a very central location in Kreuzberg--2km walk to Checkpoint Charlie, 500m from the famous Bergmannstrasse, 1km to the Tempelhofer Feld with lots of transport (U7) and amenities in a 5 minute walking radius. There are two bedrooms, each with a double bed, a modern bathroom, and a cozy and spacious open living/dining/kitchen which is perfect for unwinding in the evenings.

name: Big cosy room in Neukölln, Berlin
description: The room is perfect for two persons. Located in a nice and lively neighborhood. Close to loads of restaurants, bars, supermarkets and 3 supernice students to live with. The bus is just in front of the building and 300 m. to U-Bahn Rathaus Neukölln.

name: Great old house right in the heart of Neukölln
description:
Our spacious beautiful 3.5 room appartment is on a quiet historical street in the middle of Neukölln.
The flat is fully equipped, in the kitchen you'll find everything to cook your own meals and prepare good coffee.

The appartment is above a great bar where you can enjoy fine german beer and other nice drinks (even in the reach of your babyphone!). Sometimes you hear some sound from the bar at night.

The next tube (U7) is 5min, the next train (S-Bahn) 10min by foot.

name: beautiful room for 1-3 Persons
description: You'll find this cozy room in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Lot´s of different Stores, Bars and Restaurants in the Neighbourhood. Public transport just 2 minutes away (S41/42 and U2). Famous clubs like Berghain or Kater Blau just 20 Minutes away

name: Sunny near Wista & HU-campus Adlershof
description:
Spacious sunny room with balcony and great view in a modern house in a quiet, green area. Walking distance to institutes of Humboldt-university, resaerch institutes, companies and TV-studios on WISTA-Campus Adlershof.

15min by car / 40 min by public transport from BER. Approximately 55 min to tourist places downtown by public transport.

No shared kitchen, but you have your own small fridge and a microwave in your room.

I have a cat in my house.

name: Stylish living next to Mauerpark
description: Beautiful, stylish and cozy room in central neighbourhood. Living next to the Mauerpark, Mitte/Prenzlberg. Good shopping, cafes and restaurant all close by.

name: Double Room (ensuite) in artsy penthouse
description:
Enjoy a spacious and bright rooftop flat in vibrant Friedrichshain. You will have absolute privacy in your double room with ensuite bathroom. And just in front of your room is the smaller terrace located, perfect for a breakfast or a drink in the evening.

The flat has three bedrooms in total, two toilets (one of them in your room, with shower and bathtub), living room/kitchen, one little terrace and a rooftop terrace.

The flat is in the 5th floor with elevator.

name: Beautiful Altbau apartment in Neukölln
description:
A beautiful, calm bedroom in a 2room apartment, with a big window to the inner yard of an Altbau in the heart of Neukölln! The kitchen has a sofa and a breakfast table, and is very bright and nice to sit and chill.
The area is very popular, with many cafes, bars and parks near by, the beautiful Körnerpark is around the corner and Temperlhofer Feld is about 10 min walk.

name: Cozy and Chill Room in Berlin
description:
Keep it simple at this peaceful and centrally-located place with very lovely and clean flatmates.

Excellent connection to public transport (10 minutes to Alexanderplatz, 20 minutes to the central station, 15 minutes to Ostkreuz) in a quiet residential area.

Listing address: John-Schehr Str. 13 - Prenzlauerberg, 10407, Berlin, Germany

name: Gemütliches Zimmer mit eigenem Balkon in Fhain
description:
The room is located in the scenic Friedrichshain in a 3-room apartment. You live here with my boyfriend, me and our 4 month old puppy.
You have access to the balcony from your room, which will delight you with sun when the weather plays along:)
Kitchen and bathroom are shared.
The M10 is about 3 min away and takes you to Warschauer Str in 10 min. The Ringbahn can also be reached within 10 minutes.
An Edeka and various lateis are right around the corner.

name: Sun filled room in the heart of Neukölln
description:
We're offering a sun filled room in beautiful apartment right opposite the maybachufer canal and within walking distance to all of Neukolln's hot spots.

Weserstrasse is right on our doorstep and Pannierstasse is a short stroll away.

Closet U banh is Rathaus Neukölln, Boddinstrasse & Hermanplatz & S banh is Sonnenalle.

The apartment comes with a refurbished kitchen, bathroom, shared balcony and super sound housemates!

name: The perfect room for your Berlin visit
description:
Just few minutes walk from underground (U6 and U9 ) and Ringbahn. Very comfortable location to reach all the highlight districts in Berlin! The flat is shared with other two guys, Olivier and Matteo, who are very kind and will take care of your arrival.
Coffee or tea in the morning are on the house as well as some stuff to cook you'll find in the kitchen ;)

name: Shared flat in central Berlin / student apartment
description:
The flat is right next to main train circle in Berlin, Neukölln, Kreuzberg, central Berlin, the coolest place in the world ;). The next sipermarkets are 30 secs away & you can use my bike to go to treptower park in less than 10 min.
My (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) are 2 girls & they don't want to live with a guy (sorry guys...) so if you're female feel free to write me. :) I will be gone for 3 weeks with only a backpack so I have a wardrobe full of clothes that you can wear if you like.

name: City Center Room in Berlin / in der Innenstadt
description:
Berlin, Friedrichshain/Prenzlauer Berg, very close to everything, in the city centre, cosy and peaceful. I would like to offer you some space in my 55 square meters 2-bedroom apartment - one private room for you and one for me. Einzelzimmer. Bathroom with bath tub. The kitchen supplies you with everything as pictured.
At the moment I work a lot, so i will leave early and come home in the evenings. Or my friend will stay with you.
Always open to chat and have a glass of wine with some cheese.

name: Friendly room + own balcony in shared flat
description:
Friendly room with own balcony in the heart of one of the most up and coming parts of Neukölln. Bars, restaurants and supermarkets are right around the corner. Public transportation (S-Bahn, U-Bahn, Bus) within 5-10 minutes walking distance.

Other vibrant city districts such as Kreuzberg or Friedrichshain are just a 10 minute S- or U-Bahn ride from here.

You will share this apartment with my wonderful flatmate Hanna (who is usually out and about, studying or working) while I'm out of town.

name: Private room in penthouse in the heart of PBerg.
description:
Private room in a penthouse in the heart of PBerg.

- 1min walking distance to train station / U-Bahn & Straßenbahn.
- Dozens of restaurants, food stalls, bakeries, and bars within 5min walking distance.
- Mauerpark 5min walking distance.
- New apartment with sophisticated sound isolation.
- Shared flat with entrepreneurs and investors from the Berlin startup ecosystem, very international and open-minded.
- Private room, shared kitchen, and open office (two-floor apartment).

name: Gemütliches, zentrales Zimmer in Berlin, Mitte
description: Bright 16cm2 room, super central in Berlin Mitte in a spacious apartment with 3 warm roommates and beautiful roof terrace.

name: Cosy Flat in Berlin- Charlottenburg
description:
Cozy room for rent in 3-person WG in Charlottenburg over New Year's Eve in Berlin.

S-Bahn: Westend (Ring)
Subway: U12 Sophie-Charlotte-Platz

name: Sunny Room in Top Floor Apartment
description: Sunny top floor apartment located in  Tempelhof, lots of parks around; open kitchen and spacious living room, two bathrooms, and a balcony!

name: Loft | BIG MAMA Berlin
description:
We are a family owned and independent Hotel in the heart of Berlin. We offer spaces for everyone, either in our Hostel Dorms, Family apartments, Loft´s, Business apartments, double or single rooms!
In our brand new BIG MAMA´S Bar you can enjoy cold and hot drinks!
We are looking forward to welcoming you @bigmama!

description: Welcome to my Berlin old building apartment. With me you will find beautiful old-building flair and a small green garden oasis in one. Located close to the center in the district of Weißensee, you can wonderfully explore my beautiful city from here. My apartment is located on the ground floor and is wonderfully cool in summer and cozy in winter. My cat Maude and my bitches of Abby and Nelly live with me. I look forward to supporting you in your wanderings through Berlin.

name: Weigandufer, Neukölln, Treptow
description: 25qm room available from 01.02.2024 till 29.02.2024. So you got the chance to stay in our lovely barrio. Maybe also possible to stay one or two weeks longer, but not sure yet. Located in Berlin/Neukölln/Weigandufer, directly on the waterside.  68qm flat, fully furniture. Balcony also possible to use. Internet and flatphone are also included. Metro, bus and so on close by 5min walking. Families with dogs or kids welcome :)

name: Spacious room in the north of Friedrichshain
description:
Beautiful and very confortable room for Berlin lovers or visitors!
I'm renting from time to time my very spacious (25square meters) in a quiet flatshare next to Lansberger Allee. You will find every thing you need to relaxe after a big day in the city and you will be well connected to go out and enjoy Berlin at night. Very well deserved with Ring Bahn at a 6min walk (S-Landsberger Alle) and Tram and the door (M8). You are in 25 min at Hauptbahnof and in 15 min in Mitte (Rosenthaler Platz).

name: Calm, cozy room in Kreuzberg
description:
Calm and cozy room in the heart of Kreuzberg (close to Bergmannkiez).
Ideal for travelers, backpackers, couples who wish to discover the city.
The room is lightflooded and calm with a nice chillout area on the window-sill.
In a comfortable, well-equipped and clean shared flat.

name: Green Homeoffice with terrace near Alexanderplatz
description:
This room is part of a WG, it could be possible that you share the apartment with my roommates.

Retreat to the quiet and calming side of Berlin and enjoy your morning coffee on terrace right at your room doorstep. This room is located in the heart of Berlin, minutes away from amazing sights like TV Tower and Museum Island and legendary nightlife area Friedrichshain and Neuköln.

name: Doubleroom
description:
The W22 Hotel am Kurfürstendamm welcomes you with a special charm. In a dignified Berlin old building
discover an ambience between Kitsch and coziness.
A haven of peace for business travelers,
Basis for culture, art and fashion lovers.
Playroom for parents and children.
The spacious rooms on three floors surprise with an imaginative design. On the 1st floor there is, for example, a castle, a ranch and a game room.
Same-day bookings are possible until 6pm

description: A central, bright and breezy residence fit for an artist. The space is inviting, relaxed, and has a great vantage point of the city of Berlin.

description:
-english-
Bright spacious room in shared flat (still clean and neat) with a nice view over the trees of Arnswalder Platz and the Fernsehturm (tv tower at Alexanderplatz)! Central location (2 km from Alexanderplatz), but in a quite area.

- German-
Bright, large room in shared apartment (still clean and tidy) overlooking the treetops of Arnswalder Platz and the TV tower! Despite centrally located (2 km from Alexanderplatz), a quiet area.

name: Beautiful spacious room in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description:
A cosy, clean and spacious room (22m²) is waiting for you to rest and get energy to explore the exciting city of Berlin.

The flat and the area is very quiet but its still located in the heart of Friedrichshain, 10 minute walk or 1 metro station to Frankfurter Tor / Warschauer Straße :)

The flat provides anything you need for your stay in Berlin.

name: Super central & cozy room at Zionskirchplatz!
description:
In the Heart of Berlin,
stay in an german style apartment.

Welcome to my home in the heart of vibrant Berlin center - a perfect home base for your Berlin adventure!
I love to share my home with travelers as I'm used to when on travels around the world. I'm happy to help and give you some local tips.
You'll have a bright, comfortable and quiet room for yourself; kitchen and bathroom will be shared.

name: Wohnliches Zimmer am Stadtrand
description: Spend beautiful days in this quiet accommodation near forest and water in Berlin concierge height. The property is currently only rented to women and couples. Male guests only in female accompaniment. The nearest bus station is called Falkenplatz.

name: Cozy room in the Centre of Berlin
description: Enjoy the simple life in this quiet and centrally located accommodation.

name: Zimmer in Mitte / Hackescher Markt
description:
My beautiful Plattenbau apartment is centrally located in Mitte between Hakescher Markt and Rosenthaler Platz.
It is the perfect starting point to explore the city as all S-Bahn lines, a subway station and numerous streetcar and bus lines are within walking distance from here.
The apartment is quiet and the room is on the back side with windows to a green backyard.
The area around the apartment is very lively and has many nice restaurants and stores.

name: Cozy room in Berlin Kreuzberg
description:
This listing is only for long-term rentals with a notice period of 3 months. Ein unbefristeter Wohnraummietvertrag wird abgeschlossen.

LOCATION:
The room is located in a very beautiful building in the middle of the hip Berlin district Kreuzberg close to Berlin Mitte! The underground station Kottbusser Tor can be reached by foot within few minutes. It is the hotspot for charming cafes, bars and restaurants that serve specialities from all over the world.

name: Eastside -  Spacious room in the heart of Berlin
description:
Welcome to our beautiful apartment in Karl-Marx-Allee, in the heart of Berlin.

The apartment is located on the sunny side of the Allee and offers more than just space to sleep.

By foot you can quickly reach Alexanderplatz, a subway station is right in front of the entrance and the street itself is an important traffic axis for Berlin. You just can't get more mobility!

The building is equipped with an elevator. Thanks to the optimal connection to local public transport, all points in the city can be reached quickly and easily.
license:

Listing address: Schönhauser Allee 59, 10437, Berlin, Germany

name: Schönes Zimmer mit Balkon trendiges Friedrichshain
description: Welcome to my beautiful turn of the century apartment in trendy Friedrichshain. You would stay very close to Berlin nightlife is, near to many restaurants and tourist sights. Your room is spacious (20 sqm, 215 sq feet), sunny and beautifully furnished. I put a proper mattress on the couch. My guest assure me that  it is a very  comfortable bed (queen size, 1,60m). You have a sunny balcony and a small bathroom to yourself. You are welcome to use the shower in the second bathroom and my kitchen.

name: Berlin Central Room 4 Rent
description:
My apartment in the centre of Berlin is a great place to stay. Tram, S- and U-Bahn are close (not more than 7 min away) and you can easily reach all the other beautiful parts of the city.

The apartment is an old one with new hardwood floor. I love my room because you can sleep and relax quietly. Some international restaurants are nearby and a supermarket is just around the corner.

name: Little room in relaxed Student flat share.
description:
The place is 3 min next to the "Tempelhofer Feld" and the train station "Tempelhof", Ring, S-Bahn, U-Ban, Bus are available, it's up to 25 min to the Berlin city center.
5 min walk to the next Aldi, Kaufland,Getränkehoffman and the next Späti.
You are living together with two relaxed students so drinking and smoking is allowed ;)

name: Cozy, spacious room in Neukölln
description:
The room is in a 2 room apartment, located in Neukölln, close to the former Tempelhof Airport which is now used as a big park. Kitchen and bathroom are shared with us.
Neukölln is one of the most exciting places to stay in Berlin at the moment. However, the apartment is not noisy at all. Metro, supermarkets, and nice cafes and restaurantare very close
If you need any tips, just let me know :)

Please note that there is a cat in the flat. He will of course stay with us!

name: Barnimkiez Berlin  (Reg-Nr. 02/Z/AZ/018925-24)
description: My apartment is located in Berlin Friedrichshain. The location is more than exceptionally convenient to traffic.  Famous streets, squares, historical buildings, museums and  exhibitions, theaters and clubs are within a radius of about 2.5-3 km and are therefore within walking distance. There are many restaurants and shopping facilities. I will give recommendations and am always open to questions. Friedrichshain Volkspark is next door and is suitable for sporting activities.

name: Kreuzberg Bestlage 1A im Kiez
description:
Old Berlin apartment with charm, 94 sqm of space, 3.40 meters of room height with stucco, plank floor and double glazed windows.
Flooded with light despite the north side with a small balcony.

Comfy queen size bed. Living and sleeping area are separated/connected by 2 large French doors.

Free public parking in front of the door and side streets.

Lots of bars/cafes and pubs as well as shopping in the immediate vicinity.

The apartment is located in the 2nd floor front building without elevator.

name: Stilvolle und helle Unterkunft
description: I'm traveling during the booking time, so you have full privacy. Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally located property. The flat is very well connected. It is only 1 minute to the Yorkstraße subway and S-Bahn station. Other popular districts such as Kreuzberg, Neukölln, Mitte and Charlottenburg are very quickly accessible. The beautiful park on the Gleisdreieck is only 5 min by walking.

name: huge privat room for up to 3 persons
description: cozy stylish typical berlin-appartment, 100m². + kitchen incl. dishwasher + bathroom with tube and washer + bright living room with TV/netflix and big sofa (sleep for 2 persons) + extra airbed for 2 persons + publictransportation in immediately proximity +quit neighborhood , no noise from clubs or bars in the suburb

name: Sehr hell
description:
The room is located in Prenzlauer Berg,5 minutes from the park at Friedrichshain. Alexanderplatz is 15 minutes by tram line 5 and 6, 20 minutes to the central station, 5 minutes to S-Bahn 41 and 42 and other lines e.g. Schönefeld and Tegel Airport.
The Cothenius Str is very quiet,no bars or the like.
Lidl 10 minutes ,Edeka and Netto Supermarkets are 5 minutes from here.
The room is very light and quiet ,it is directed out of a backyard.

name: Berlin Altbau - Relaxing space for 2 in Kreuzkölln
description: Our home is a fairly large Jugendstil Altbau style apartment on the ground floor, we modernised it and live and work here with our son - born 2016 and quiet and shy dog called Kaia. We may be away, and therefore not sharing the bathroom! Ask us for more info. We have opened the listing for 3 incase that you want to come with one child. The room now features a sauna so it is not so easy to accommodate a third adult.

name: Sunny room in Neukölln, on the river, solo woman
ROOM for Rent
description:
Hello my name is Daniel;)

The room is 25m2 and is located at Prenzlauer Berg/Weißensee! With the tram it is 13 minutes to Alexanderplatz and 6 minutes to Weißensee.
A direct connection to the S-Bahn(Ringbahn) is within walking distance in about 6 minutes.
The residential complex is located on a quiet green area with various parks within walking distance. Shopping is right around the complex;) so there is everything you need. Greetings Daniel

name: Double room | Citylight Hotel Berlin
description: In cozy and comfortable beds you will sleep like a dream. Let yourself go and make yourself comfortable after an exciting day in the pulse of the city. Our rooms are bright, friendly and without a lot of chichi. Exactly right and just like Berlin. You'll enjoy your time at this cheerful getaway.

I rent a comfortable room in my newly renovated apartment. The room itself has a comfortable double bed and a desk. Bathroom with bathtub and the large kitchen-cum-living-room are shared.

Then I welcome you in to my beautiful living room with big sofa bed (for two), desk, piano and comfy chair. It's very close to the canal alongside which nice walks into trendy areas of Berlin are possible. Within 15 min you're either at Görlitzerpark, in the 'Flüsseviertel' in Neukölln or at Underground station Hermannplatz or S-Bahn station Treptower Park.

Bathroom with tub will be shared, no use of the kitchen, however hot drinks can be made any time!

you can use kitchen and bathroom.

Close to bars, restaurants, clubs and sights (walking distance to several clubs like wilde Renate, Else, Chalet). The peaceful surrounding invites for nice walks along the water. Serves to escape busy Berlin and well connection to public transport and shared bikes outside

Free coffee, tea + filtered water

name: Gayfriendly Roof top - Berlin, Prenzlauer Berg
description: Perfectly designed appartment under the roof - lots of cafés and restaurants nearby. Big bed in my living room, means you,ll have your own room. You can lock the door, if you need your privacy. You can use my balcony of my personal room if you want to. Marble bathroom... gentle owner... feel free to ask!! Finally it’s all about chemistry - some information about you to prove if it fits is appreciated...

name: quiet and comfortable between Xberg-Neukölln

You stay in a loft bed (140-200) - or if you want you can also use the narrow sofa underneath, it's cozy and a balcony lets you be outside quickly even on the 4th floor:)
And if there are no leaves on the trees, you will also see the TV tower

description:
Small charming room in nice apartment (4th floor, no elevator!) with single bed.
We will share bathroom, kitchen and dining area.
Very quiet neighborhood, close to Central Station (Hauptbahnhof, 15 min. by bus).
Also close to Bahnhof Zoo and Bus terminal ZOB. (From Airport BER it takes about 1 h.)
If you travel by car please note the parking fee!

name: Huge room in shared flat  Gesundbrunnen30m to U9/8
description:
Since I am traveling for a month, I prefer to rent my room in our wonderful 3-person apartment in the Gesundbrunnen 30 m from Osloer Straße U-Bahn [subway] station for a longer period of time.
With 24m², it is the largest room in the 110m² old building apartment. In general, you will not be missing space in the apartment due to the 4m high ceilings, the living room, the spacious kitchen and the two bathrooms. You also have Wi-Fi and a screen for cozy evenings.
Looking forward to seeing you soon

name: Big cozy vintage room in Berlin Friedrichshain

name: Zimmer in Berlin Lichterfelde Nähe S Bahn
description:
Nice Room in a Penthouse ( Dachgeschoss) flat in Lichterfelde-Ost. Sunny and fresh renovated.

You can reach the S-Bahn, Regional Bahn and several bus stations Lichterfelde - Ost by feet. Eg. the train to Potsdamer Platz takes 15 minutes.

name: Large room with double bed in Neukölln
description: Big room with a double bed, internet and very close of parks such as Hasenheide and Tempelhof. 4 minutes walking to Boddinstr. U bahn station. Near of the center and incredible bars and art galleries.

name: A cosy room in Mitte for single traveler ♡
description:
A Cosy & quiet room with bank bed and many plants 🌱 in the heart of Berlin!
I support single girl traveler💪🏼
If you are couple, PLEASE message me before you make a booking !!

Location : S-Bahn Hackescher markt station 2min by foot / U-Bahn Alexanderplz station 5min by bike.
To Museum Island is 7min walk.
To Warschauer Str / Berghain🏢 is only 3~4stops by S-Bahn.
Cafe,Restaurant, Kino, Literally everything is here!X

The kitchen can also be used for cold food. Apartment is in a quieter side street, but super connected. Around the corner: small and large shops, best restaurants, wine shops, cafes, late sales & bars ++ U-Bahn line 7 & bus lines are just a few minutes walk.
