name: Private room in minimalistic home in Moabit
description:
We welcome you to our home in beautiful Moabit !

We are not an airbnb-hotel, but a couple (and a dog) living and working in Berlin, since 5 years. We do airbnb to support our rent and also to meet interesting people from all over the world!

We're happy to meet you and share our best tips in Berlin. If it's not your first time in Berlin, Moabit is the perfect spot to discover some hidden gems that are not full of tourists. Main attractions are also close by, by bike or public transport!

name: Cute vintage apartment
description:
This special place has stayed unchanged for 116 years. Full of history and magic, the entire building is full of curious surprises, particularly in the beautiful garden. Pankow is a great location in Berlin because it’s close enough to the action if you want a night out, but it is also family friendly and has lots of parks and cafes nearby.

DISCLAIMER: My neighbour has some pet raccoons (they are friendly) you may encounter one. Please do not feed them, but they like it when they are sung to.

name: Peaceful room in bustling Friedrichshain
description:
Welcome to our apartment, which still retains the charm of its previous life as a student flat. Our room is a comfortable choice for guests looking for a convenient home base during their stay in Berlin, with great connections of public transport and and in proximity to the city's nightlife.
Despite being located within walking distance to Berghain nightclub, RAW, and the vibrant Simon-Dach-Str. area, our place offers a peaceful retreat from the city's noise.

name: Beautiful and big room with balcony in Neukölln
description: Welcome to Neukölln! Be our guest in our beautiful apartment right on the famous Sonnenallee. The apartment is located in Neukölln, a historic and cultural area, with many bars, cafes, restaurants and cool shops. You can cook in our well-equipped kitchen with balcony and relax and enjoy our bathtub, excellent for the winter! Your room has a large balcony and high ceilings and lots of light.

name: Single room Shared Bathroom-Courtyard view
description:
Individually furnished small pension. No hotel atmosphere. No TV. powerful WiFi.
Small kitchen. Tea / coffee is ready.
Authentic Berlin experience away from the tourist crowds. There are even traditional "corner pubs" here. Good infrastructure.

description: A large room in the middle of Berlin, close to everything. Plenty of restaurant, bars and shops close by.  Less than 20 minutes to most major Clubs and tourist destinations by train.  U8 train station right outside the building.

name: Quiet room in Kreuzberg
description: A cheerful room with a comfortable bed in a large shared apartment. I also have a sofa-sleeper for two in my room, but -to be honest- it`s very uncomfortable to sleep on it. We have also a kitchen, bath tub, washing machine, two restrooms, WLAN, etc.

description: Kick back and relax in this calm, stylish space. Wake up feeling refreshed in the heart of the city and enjoy the bright and tranquil space of this luxurious Berlin home. Complete with unique designer furniture, rustic wooden floors, and bold, artistic decor, this spacious home offers an eclectic, modern style.

name: Cozy room in vibrant Neukolln neigborhood.
description:
The room is quiet and bright with a comfy bed (120x200), desk and my personal library which you can use as well :)

Located in Neukolln, close to Tempelhofer Park and Schillerkiez, one of the trendy neighborhoods full with hip cafes and restaurants.

It is very well connected with 5 mins walking distance from the subway (U8) and the ring.

I will be available anytime over the phone, to make sure you have a safe and comfortable stay.

name: Zimmer in Steglitz
description:
Welcome to my old apartment with garden view. There is a kitchen for cooking with fridge and freezer, spices and all what you need. You have a bright workspace with desk, internet cable and wifi, sound system, and sunny loggia. In the backyard there is peace during the day, even though the neighbors are in the garden in front of the loggia.
Your room can be darkened about 90% at night.

name: Room in gorgeous loft
description: Your room is on the 4th floor of an old factory  in Alt Treptow. You can use the kitchen and the main area of the apartment, as well as the sunny balcony. It is very quiet, away from the street.  You are walking distance from the nightlife of Neukölln or Kreuzberg. Around the corner is the huge Treptower Park which is perfect for a run along the river Spree. Large organic supermarket one block away. Restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood.

name: Spacious room in vibrant Neukölln
description: I'm renting out my spacious room while I'm travelling. The light flooded 30m2 private room is in a shared flat with 2 other people. Located close to Hermannplatz and Maybachufer you'll have a central spot to go on adventures and discover an authentic flat sharing experience in Berlin

name: Schniekes Zimmer im Rigaerkiez!
description:
Our house is right across from a well-known occupied house in Berlin. Correspondingly, the atmosphere here is also. Everything is very colorful, there is always something going on, overall very pleasant and likeable. You still feel like you can be part of the real Berlin with its diversity and rebellious charm, and that in the city center.

And of course you also have a bar under you, which you can also hear on weekends (times more, sometimes less, sometimes not at all).

name: Helles Zimmer mit Balkon in Nord-Neukölln
description: Enjoy a stylish experience at this centrally-located home.

name: Stilvolles & gemütliches Zimmer, Girls only
description:
Enjoy a nice stay in this stylishly furnished room in our girls shared apartment in Berlin, Pankow.

There are three of us living here and we offer you the room that is currently available. Two of the rooms have a bunk bed (double bed).

The shared apartment is well connected to public transport, but also a quiet afternoon, two parks are within walking distance. A supermarket is only 90 m away and a fully equipped kitchen can be used.

name: Guestroom in East Berlin / Prenzlauer Berg
description:
ATTENTION! *** SMOKING APARTMENT ***

(Guests are allowed to smoke in the kitchen. The guest room is non-smoking!
Air purifier in the hallway, you almost can't smell the smoking here.)

For private and business!

Cozy room with a round bed (diameter 2.20 m) in Prenzlauer Berg. Cozy 18 sqm room, sunny and quiet, south side and only 8 minutes to the tram and 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz. Very good transport links.

NO REGISTRATION OR OWNER CERTIFICATE POSSIBLE!

name: Schönes Zimmer in Tempelhof
description:
Close to: U-Bahn, Ringbahn, Tempelhofer Feld, shopping
With a nice roommate, namely with me ;-)
With balcony, kitchen, bathroom, washing machine and internet - so everything you need.

name: Beautiful, cosy, stylish, old-style room
description: Right in the middle of Friedrichshain, very close to the centre of Berlin, this cosy,  art-deco room is perfect for couples, or friends, who want to experience the most Berlin can offer. Looking forward to meeting you!

name: Cozy private room in the heart of Berlin-Mitte
description:
Private room at the heart of Berlin-Mitte.
Great natural light. 100m away from metro station. One of the most vibrant localities in Berlin.

name: Top Location, quiet & safe. Easy access anywhere
description:
Between Kudamm -& iconic KaDeWe- and Tiergarten -the biggest garden in Berlin-.

Dinner by the lake or high-end city life: both within a short walk.

Quick access to all tourist attractions (Brandenburger Tor, Alexanderplatz, Checkpoint Charlie & Potsdamer Platz).

Berlin's sightseeing buses 100 & 200 at a few steps away: perfect location for tourists.

Check-in at any time and I'll help get here (or with anything else you may need).

name: gemütlich/ruhig in super Lage!
description: You live in a 23 m² room of an 81 m² apartment on the 4th floor and sleep in a 1.60 x 2.00 m bed. Windows are oriented to the east (morning sun) and to the backyard (very quiet). We share the fully equipped kitchen and bathroom. Hope you make yourself at home!

name: Berlin private room in the best Kiez, Kreutzkolln
description:
Our flat is sandwiched between Berlin's trendy and lively neighborhoods of Kreuzberg and Neukölln. It's off the U7 and U8 train lines, offering easy access to the rest of the city. Located in a culturally rich area, there is dining from every ethnic cuisine imaginable. Bars, cafes, and stores are giving their own version of campy elegance.

There are three long-term flatmates living in the flat.

A Siamese cat named Fettuccine is chill and sweet and the same goes for the humans.

name: My beloved apartment in Prenzlauerberg
description:
The apartment is located in the coolest part of Prenzlauerberg. The area is full of restaurants, bars, shops, and the best markets in town. (MauerPark etc). The excellent connection with pubblic transport network will allow you to get around Berlin easily. This part of the apartment ( bathroom, large bedroom- (with kitchen) is for you own private use, but there is someone else in another room.
During Christmas Hdays will be possible to rent the all apt. including the second room (upon request)

name: Cosy double room in modern flat
description: A cosy double room in a modern flat in award winning architect-designed house and a huge terrace. The apartment is located in a very nice area, Bötzow Viertel in Prenzlauer Berg, quite but with a number of local amenities and restaurants.

name: Private room in Prenzlauerg
description: My room has two large windows that bring in lots of natural light, high ceilings, wooden floors and a view out to the courtyard. The flat has a large kitchen and a balcony looking out to the main street!

name: Private rooftop apartment room
description: Welcome to our home - it's a calm, quiet, relaxing apartment full of light at the rooftop of an old house in Tempelhof. In your room you find enough room to work & make yourself a home. You can also relax in the living room, fine dine with cooked food from the kitchen or sit on the balcony with a beautiful view over the "peace square".  Additionally, you will have a private shower and toilet. As an interior designer, I am also continuously upgrading the apartment, adding decorations.

name: Great location for 'Berlinale' Kreuzberg&Neukölln
description:
The main Theater Potdamerplatz is 15 mins away and many theaters in F-hain and Kreuzberg you can also see Berlinale movies.
Me and my flat mate we both studied film and photography. We can give you more information about Berlinale if you needed.
Kreuzberg is really great location. If you are into about 'Toand day Berlin'. My flat is just one minute from U8 Schönleinstr and you will have the sunny 30m2 room with a super king size bed. It has the beautiful open kitchen where you can chill.

name: Sunny Room Berlin Neukölln
description:
Big room, nice window - old oriel front, nice Kitchen, Bathroom with bathtub, washing machine and Internet. All running costs included. There is one other lodger in his extra room but most of the time out of house.
Good train connect.S-train(ring)+Subway

name: Cozy Prenzlauer Berg Room Close To City Center
description:
I am renting out a bedroom in my super cozy flat in Prenzlauer Berg. It is located in a rather quiet street in Prenzlauer Berg, yet still very close to the city center and with great access to public transportation. The flat is equipped with everything you could need, whether it's for a weekend visit to Berlin or a longer stay for work.
I am looking forward to your inquiries and bookings and will be happy to host you. So if you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me!

Welcome to our place, a place that's much more than just a place to sleep. Here you will find a welcoming atmosphere, where modernity meets coziness.

Enjoy flexibility and comfort. Our commitment to world-class service means that we are always there for you. Be it for recommendations on local attractions or just to make sure you have everything you need – your well-being is at the center of our actions.

name: ruhiges Doppelzimmer nah der FU & US Botschaft
description:
In the countryside - calm and spacious accommodation close to Free University and the US Embassy

The apartment is in the countryside, five minutes from the Grunewald and is still excellently connected to the subway and bus.
The apartment is very bright and sunny, with a nice balcony.
The apartment is suitable for people with walking disabilities. There is an elevator.

name: Unwind in central Kreuzberg
description: The apartment is not super luxurious, but comfortable, and spacious just like your room. The kitchen is fully equipped and has a wooden bar table, and a nice couch. And We have a private ouside area with a lot more couches to spend nice evenings or morning breakfast on.

description:
Center, 1 sunny comfortable bedroom with park panorama, livingroom with a table for 4, very well funiture kitchen, bath with shower and tube, entrance. Just walking distance to the government area with Brandenburger Tor, Mauerpark and 24/7 Bus and Metro!
Center, bright, comfortable bedroom ; living room with dining table for 4, complete kitchen, cool bathroom (shower/tub) shared + anteroom and all within walking distance of the government district with Brandenburg Gate and Mauerpark.

name: Cozy and bright room in Neukölln
description: We are offering a private room in our flatshare in Berlin Neukölln for one guest. You will share the apartment with two other people hence also be part of our day to day life in a flatshare. Like a local haha;). The room (20 qm) is only 2 min away from the trainstation, perfect transport connection - supermarket, pubs, restaurants.

name: Bright and spacious room in Fhain - with balcony
description: Bright and spacious room in Altbaum in Friedrichshain. Located in front of a park, easy access to the Ubahn and Sbahn. If you feel like partying 15 minutes walk to Warschauer str, RAW or 20 min on foot to Berghain. If you feel like to relax and enjoy the city your in the great place to start.

name: Two rooms in historic old building
description: Two nice, spaceous rooms inside a old, beautiful apartment in Schöneberg. Various trains as well as the Ku'damm can easily be reached by foot within 10 minutes walking distance. The rooms have their own bathroom, balcony.

name: Hozspot/Central! Bright room in Friedrichshain!
description:
Welcome to the popular and wonderful Friedrichshain!

Many popular scene and neighborhood places as well as many beautiful side streets with a huge selection of cafes, bars and clubs await you. :)

The location is really central and you have all means of transport nearby.
The modern Berlin-Mitte, the cultural New Cologne as well as the nightlife known Kreuzberg can be reached in 15 minutes.

Also many parks and canals as well as Berlin's only peninsula nearby !!!

name: Cosy Room Berlin Friedenau
description: I rent out my small, cozy shared room in Berlin for 10 days. The room is about 18 square meters, has a balcony and is equipped with a table and a large bed. This would make it perfect for 1 person or a couple.

name: Comfortable room in Neukölln´s best area
description:
I rent a nice room in my old apartment in Berlin, Neukölln. The apartment is located in the trendy district of Neukölln, many cafes, bars and restaurants are very close to the apartment.


The apartment is only 2 minutes away from Tempelhofer Feld. Guests are well connected to public transport. The subway and several buses are a 3-5 minute walk away.

I wish guests a nice stay in Berlin!

name: Lovely room in the very heart of Neukoelln
description:
The apartment is located in the heart of Neukölln - between Tempelhofer Feld and the popular Weserkiez and the Kreuzköllner Canal.

The apartment has two rooms and one of them would be for you. The room itself is equipped with a double bed, desk, clothes rail, mirror and shelf.

The room is 15 sqm big and is equipped with a double bed, a desk, clothes rack a big mirror and a shelf. You could use the kitchen and the bathroom just like a regular tenant.

name: Kreuzberg: Central sunny room for a woman
description:
The offer „furnished room“ is preferably for a woman.

The kitchen of the apartment is not part of the offer and can not be used.

name: Beautiful room in the middle of Berlin !
description:
The room is in a 3 room apartment. We are 2 flatmates with a background in design. The apartment is located close to Mariannenplatz, Markthalle Neun, Oranienstrasse, Maybachufer and East Side Gallery.
It is perfect if you want to have a good time in Berlin, a lot of nice restaurants and bars in this area.

name: Nice room in Friedrichshain, ready to move in
description: Hey guys, I'm looking for a new flatmate for my apartment in Friedrichshain. It is ready to move in on 01.08.2018. The room is 15 square meters, and fully furnished if you want. The big comfortably kitchen and livingroom (about 30 square meters)  and household appliances aso can also be shared. The warm rent is 505 €. The fixed rate for internet and electricity is calculated with 15 €. I am pleased about nice interested people, who could imagine joining our familiar community!

name: Charmer in heart of Neukölln!
description: A big, bright room with balcony to relax and feel right at home!  Centrally located in ‘Reuterkiez’ & only minutes from Hermannplatz Ubahn .  This cool sweet escape comfortably fits two.  Enjoy coffee in the cosy kitchen or wind-down & take a bath.

name: Private room with balcony in Karl- Marx- Allee
description: Beautiful, sunny appartement perfectly situated

name: A big room in a beautiful modern Apartment :)
description: A big room with a double bed (160cm x 200cm) in a beautiful modern apartment in Berlin Friedrichshain. The room is a part from a 3 rooms apartment (two sleeping rooms, one living room, a kitchen and a toilet). My guests get a private sleeping room and can enjoy the nice living room and the other parts of the apartment. The apartment ist fully equipped, so you don't need to bring anything besides your clothes.

name: Großzügiges Dachstudio in traumhafter Lage
description:
Fantastic attic studio in a quiet green location on the Wannsee is waiting for a guest or two!
After extensive sightseeing in the Berlin city, you can relax in the natural surroundings. In contrast to the bustling city center, Berlin-Kladow offers a haven of peace on the banks of the Havel, which widens to the Wannsee. You can walk endlessly on the waterfront. A special attraction is the BVG ferry via the Wannsee.

name: Room # 3 -Messe- Wald- u. Stadtnähe
description: Large room with balcony in  house with garden. In Nische's own sink. Otherwise bathroom, extra toilet. Everything on the 1st floor. Around a lot of greenery, quiet location, yet not far from the city :  S-Bahn or bus  in 10 minutes. Fair/Congress, City Cube in 5 to 10 minutes. ZOB close to the property. Olympia Stadium,  Waldbühne. Airport by S-Bahn!Relax in the garden at any time, beach chair, etc. Breakfast incl. ,daily newspaper, English Speaking.

name: Urban roof of Berlin-Kreuzberg
description:
The roof of Berlin Kreuzberg.

The room under the roof, located in the heart of Berlin/Kreuzberg, with a balcony is in a modern flat with full urban feeling.
Bars, restaurants and underground system, you can reach out in short walking distance.
We are located in the middle of Berlin just some meters away from the line U1 of the metro.
Although we are very centered you can find your tranquility in a modern room.
Perfect place for moving around the city or for night life appreciators.
No lift.

name: Spacious Berlin-style room in quiet neighborhood
description: The spacious room (30 m2) is located in the back of a traditional pre-WWII Berlin house with inner courtyard (with balcony) in the heart of Friedrichshain. You will share our spacious flat (160 m2) with my 3 permanent roomies. The kitchen and two bathrooms (each quipped with shower + toilet) are shared spaces. Feel free to use the washing machine or cook yourself a hot meal in the kitchen! The place is perfect to experience the real Berlin in one of the most vibrant, yet quiet quarters!

name: Gemütlich und zentral 27m² in WG
description:
I offer a large room in a shared apartment of 2. This features a 1.60 x 2.00 m bed, a welcoming couch to relax in and a bright workspace.
The apartment is a 5-minute walk from Leopoldplatz, from where you can quickly reach Friedrichstraße with the U6 or the zoo garden with the U9. In addition, the Ringbahn S41/S42 can also be reached in 5 minutes.
On Müllerstraße, you have plenty of shopping opportunities. In the nearby neighborhood there are bars, restaurants, parks...

name: Spacious room in flat share in the heart of X-berg
Big Apartment in the middle of Berlin!
description: Hey guys! I have a big, bright room in our renovated apartment in the middle of berlin/ Wedding. the underground station is just 5 minutes walk apart and in the near are many buses and shopping possibilities. I am sure you'll like it! :)

In 300 meters you are at the station Nöldnerplatz, from where the S-Bahn runs directly to the center every 3-4 minutes (Alexanderplatz, Friedrichstraße, etc.). In just 5 minutes by train you are on Warschauer Straße in the heart of Friedrichshain with several bars and shops. Nearby are some techno clubs (including Kosmonaut, Void (10 min), Sisyphos, Wilde Renate, Magdalena (20 min)).

name: Villa Veggie (nur für Frauen)
description: Villa Veggie captivates with the city's best location. Not far from Eberswalder Straße, you will be at one of Berlin's hotspots – Spätis, bars, cafes, restaurants and the Mauerpark are within walking distance. Alexanderplatz is only 15 minutes away by tram, the main train station in 20 minutes. Vegan restaurants in the immediate vicinity make every veggie heart beat faster! There are some delicacies to discover in Prenzlauer Berg and the neighboring district of Friedrichshain. Book now and discover Berlin!

name: Schlafzimmer in großer Wohnung in Berlin Mitte

We rent individual private rooms for up to two people. We don't usually be there, but it can be.  You are welcome to use our kitchen and living room.

We have a cat.

The perfect place if you need a central and quiet place to rest after exploring the city. The window is facing the inner courtyard. Where it is calm all day long. You can use the modern kitchen, cook and eat there. The room is in the 5th floor, which you can reach with an elevator.

Distance to Berlin Central Station:
5 minutes by public transport or bicycle.

Charming, spacious room with a private bathroom and a shared kitchen and terrace, in Grunewald, close to the Messe and CityCube.
It is located in a quiet, upscale residential neighborhood, near to Lake Halensee (3 minutes walk) and the forest Grunewald.
Good connection to bus (600m) and S-Bahn (1200m).

description: This apartment has all you could want for a perfect stay. Centrally located, easily accessible by traffic, food & culture in front of the door, the beautifully designed apartment in the well-kept old building allows enjoyable rest from the lively capital city.

description:
* Length of stay is flexible, contact me for details! *
This beautiful apartment in one of Berlin's historical buildings offers high ceilings with original stucco, bright rooms and wooden floors. It is located in the lively Reuterkiez - the heart of Neukölln. The neighbourhood is known for it's many good foodplaces and popular bars like Paolo Pinkel, Ä Stube etc. In 5min walking distance you can find many supermarkets and shopping places. The connection to public transport is outstandingly good.

The room has one couch for 2 people sleeping there and a bunk bed for two. Sheets and Towels will be there by arriving.

description: I'm renting long-term (three months) a cozy quite room in trendy Friedrichshain. The apartment is in a typical old Berlin building, has a nice kitchen with dish washer, bathroom with washing machine, a little balcony (in winter time you won't use it) and a television. It can happen that I'm in the apartment, most of the time you'll be for yourself :)

name: Nice room in the heart cultural life in Berlin.
description:
Hi everyone,
The room, the location and the apartment are really nice, but really the most important is you feel at home while you are here.
Perfect for 1 or 2 people!
Here racism, fascism, sexism, homophobia will not be tolerate, other than that (very principal and fundamental bases for a loving and care society living) everyone is welcome!

Through the window you can see the canal, maybachufer, which is very nice for a morning walk, before work, or after party, whichever one you choose =)

name: Hygge Room in Berlin Mitte
description:
Happy to share my living and guest room.

I'm a jazz musician and bike messenger from Berlin, opening up my colorful and cozy home.
This sunny flat is located in the heart of Berlin; half-way point between Mitte & Kreuzberg.

A cool spot for a visit to Berlin; young and friendly vibes.

Important to know: The street next to my house is busy and sometimes pretty loud.

name: Sonniges Altbauzimmer Nähe Kurfürstendamm
description: The room is part of a 4-person shared apartment in Charlottenburg

name: Cosy Room @Ostbahnhof & East Side Gallery
description:
Cozy room in a central, modern and newly renovated apartment with balcony in Friedrichshain.

Friedrichshain is the most popular district in Berlin. You can walk along the Spree, go shopping and eat or party in the surrounding clubs until late at night.

name: Sunny room close to Gleisdreieck Park
description:
The flat was renovated 4 years ago, not very big but clean and well located.
Actually we are living in this apartment with three people but two are not here at the moment.

Due to Corona we would like you to confirm that you do not go to parties and keep the Corona rules in mind, please.

We live very central and Innbetween all amazing quarters of Berlin.

Don’t hesitate to ask if you need anything.

name: Coesy room in Kreuzberg!
description:
Ask for earlier check in and later check out!!

Hello Travelers!
We offer a guest room in our 3-room 70m^2 apartment in Berlin-Kreuzberg. Our flat is located in one of the famous quarters of Kreuzberg, next to Friedrichshain (famous for clubs like Berghain). U1 (West-East) and U8 (North-South) are both in walking distance!

If you need to work while you are staying with us, we can place a small desk in the room for you.

Sarah and Till

Registrierungsnummer: 02/Z/AZ/009319-19

name: Beautiful space in Friedrichshain near centre
description: This apartment is right in the centre of Friedrichshain, close to restaurants, bars, and a perfect place for everyone who wants to explore Berlin.

name: Cozy WG-Zimmer in Berlin Neukölln
description:
The room for rent is my shared room. Accordingly, you also have a few wonderful roommates with whom you share the kitchen and bathroom and who can give you information and tips at any time:)
There is a possibility to use my bike.

name: ein Doppelzimmer im Minimal Hostel No.43
description:
Here in the beautiful Kreuzkölln, I have created a place where up to 12 people can feel like home in an international shared apartment.
There are two double bedrooms and a 6 bed rooms, which is shared.
In the neighborhood there are numerous cafes for breakfast and restaurants for dinner.
The canal for jogging or walking. The weekly market and vintage shops to shop or stroll.
I would be happy to give you tips that you can experience Berlin at your leisure.

name: Bedroom Mitte - super central
description:
Cosy bedroom in shared apartment in Alexanderplatz ! Berlin Mitte really central.

Ubahn + Tram lines at your door. Sbahn Ring quickly accessible (5min).

2 min train / 10 min walk to Alexanderplatz central square.

10 min from touristic area (Museum Island).

The room offers a lot of light all day and a view on Berlin TV Tower (ref. pictures)

name: ruhig und zentral in Berlin-Schöneberg
description:
The guest room is located in the Bavarian Quarter in Berlin-Schöneberg; nearest subway station: Bayerischer Platz (U7/U4). The City-West (Ku'damm) and the party mile around Nollendorfplatz are easily accessible by subway or bus on foot (about 10-15 min.). I speak German and English.
The host is a gay man whose partner is often in the apartment. This has no consequences for the guest, but it has to be accepted.
My place is gay-friendly.

name: Gemütliches Zimmer für Queers in Kreuzkölln
description: We mainly offer LGBTIQ* people a room in Kreukölln (Nordneukölln), a stone's throw from the green canal. The canal likes to play table tennis, enjoyed the sunset or grilled with a drink. At the same time, the apartment is quiet but centrally located in the trendy Weserkiez - bars, restaurants, shops, Spätis and Neuköllnflair at your doorstep.

name: cosy & clean room in trendy central Berlin Mitte
description:
Nice location near Rosenthaler Platz.

I’ll make sure that the whole apartment is clean and disinfected, and will provide to you a disinfectant for hands and more cleaning and disinfectant solutions.

Make yourself home in a private cosy room. Use a fully equipped kitchen and a clean windowed bathroom which you will share with me.

PS: Since June 2021, I’m fully vaccinated against COVID-19.

name: Double bed in Neukölln
description:
Excellent location for people interested in Berlin Nightlife. Bars, restaurants, supermarkets are right at the doorstep. You are in the center of Neukölln. Lovely international neighborhood filled with young people. The neighborhood lies along the Maybachufer canal. A couple living in the apartment. Good option for easy going creative types. Open minded people please! You share the apartment with one Kind quiet man from
Mozambique. You have your own room. You share kitchen and bathroom.

name: Cozy Room for Two next to Lake
description: Private room in cozy apartment in an old traditional brick house with a big inner courtyard in the beautiful district of Weissensee in Berlin. The apartment is close to a tram station that gets you in 15 minutes to Alexanderplatz and has also direct connections to the vivid districts of Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg, Friedrichschain, Wedding etc. It is also located 5 minutes away walking from the Weissensee lake which is one of the most beautiful lakes in Berlin.

name: Sonniges Zimmer in zentraler Lage
description:
I rent out my large and bright room in a central location. The room is in the front part of the apartment with a large window overlooking the Kantstraße. The S-Bahn station Savignyplatz can be reached in just 2 minutes. Kurfürstendamm is about a 10-minute walk away and there are numerous restaurants, cafes and shopping facilities right outside the door.
The room is fully furnished and in addition, the living room, kitchen and balcony will be available for you.

name: Central in Mitte! Spacious, cosy room,own entrance
description: We offer here a very spacious twin bedroom, with a practical extra entrance. The room is very central. Within walking distance of the attractive Museum Island with a variety of important museums, Berlin Cathedral and Alexanderplatz, as well as theaters, cinemas and bars. There are several subway and S-Bahn stations nearby, so everything in Berlin is quickly accessible. In the summer you can sit outside in the garden and relax or even grill with the family.

name: Schmuckstück am Ufer in Berlin-Kreuzkölln
description:
I now rent my bright living room (about 24 m2) with high ceilings, stucco and with balcony until the end of the year. Front house 1st floor. Kitchen and bathroom both have natural light and can also be used. I am
very rarely at home (currently about once a month), as I have moved into a second home in another city. There is no bed, no wardrobe and no curtains in the living room yet, you would have to organize it yourself. Flat rent including Wi-Fi, water, electricity and heating.

name: Sunny Top Floor Room with balcony in Neukölln
description: Very sunny 16m2 room with balcony in Neukölln/Kreuzkölln (the overlap of Kreuzberg and Neukölln), one block from the canal, in a quiet and residential area but very close to restaurants and bars.

name: Helles Zimmer mit 1 Bett 140 cm für zwei Personen
description: The room has a wonderful bed with an organic mattress. Is for two people to stay. In addition, a small table with two armchairs is available.

name: Privates Bad & helles, schönes Zimmer in top Lage!
description:
We, Marc and Elena, live in a beautiful bright old building and look forward to welcoming you here.
The apartment has just been newly renovated. The room is equipped with a 140x200 cm bed, a small desk, a sofa and a closet. The small but nice bathroom included. Shower, also made new, you have to yourself. The kitchen, which you are very welcome to use, is fully equipped, because I like to cook myself.

name: Triple room Standard with shared bathrooms
description: Just 2 stops with the tramway or 15 minutes by foot from “Alexanderplatz”, the famous historic center of Berlin, lies our hotel in the vibrating “Greifswalder Straße” in the super-hip district “Prenzlauer Berg”. Despite this downtown location, our rooms are situated in a quiet backyard in a typical Berliner “Altbau” with lots of flair. Spread across five floors with shared bathrooms and lockable showers and toilets we offer you everything you need to get to know this metropole during your stay.

Listing address: Greifswalder Str. 225, 10405, Berlin, Deutschland

name: Big room with balcony and amazing view
description:
Welcome to my offer.
I offer you here a large, cozy and furnished private room. You live in the famous Neukölln and have a great starting position for your Berlin adventure.
Although you live very centrally, the apartment is located in a quiet place and you have a nice view from your room. Even the TV tower can be seen.
The Ringbahn (Sbahn Sonnenalle) can be reached on foot in 14 minutes.
Thus, nothing stands in the way of your Berlin adventure!

name: Splendid home in most vibrant Neighbourhood
description:
Hello Dear guests,
My home is a place for anyone who wants to look from its colorful side in Berlin. Urberliner and the young Wilden live next to each other. Neukölln is known for its Arab culture, art, clubs and beautiful cafes. My apartment is a typical Berlin old building. The apartment is very sunny and spacious. It is charmingly and cozily decorated, in the Berlin flair. The room is quietly located with a sunny balcony to the street.

name: Private cozy room with balcony
description: The apartment is located in a quite area with loads of amazing brunch and cafes near by. It is only 5 minutes by foot to the tram or 10 minutes on the Ubahn to Alexanderplatz.

A design concept to be remembered, including in Hotel’s ZOE Bar. The only thing that can compete with its detailed design is its taptail concept.

description:
Only 4 underground stations to Alexanderplatz.

Located in Berlin's No. 1 party and student district (Simon-Dach-Str. and side streets, RAW grounds, Oberbaumbrücke, largest Berlin queer club "Die Busche", not far away the world-famous "Berghain", many 24-hour late purchases,...).
Regarding Corona: The pubs and restaurants are open, at the clubs mostly the extra installed outdoor areas.

name: Private Room next to Maybachufer
description:
The flat is located in Sanderstaße close to U-bahn Schönleinstraße and next to Maybachufer, just on the border to Kreuzberg, one station to Kottbusser Tor.

A relaxing area with lots of restaurants and bars and right next to the canal.
In summer times there is a Fleamarket every second sunday, and a farmers (and other stuff) market every tuesday and friday.
Its easy to get around in the city with the U-bahn station U8 just 2 min by foot.

name: Lovely room in the heart of Kreuzberg
description: We'd like to welcome you in our beautiful appartement, located in the heart of Kreuzberg, the perfect place to experience Berlin.

name: Cozy room next to Boxhagener Platz
description: The beautiful high-ceiling flat is located a 3min walk from the most beautiful area in Berlin- Boxhagener Platz. There you can find an abundance of bars, restaurants and cafés. On Saturdays there's a food market, on Sundays there's the famous Boxi fleamarket. There is never a dull moment in this neighborhood and the connections from here to get anywhere are great. Ostkreuz is a short walking distance from where the S-Nah takes you directly into the city, or any other districts via the Ringbahn.

name: Beautiful Cosy Great located YOUR 2 private Rooms
description: You will have 2 private rooms and sharing the apartment with me, all the rooms are very bright and very clean,the apartment is located in a great location , public transportations such as buses ,u bahn are just walking distance away from the apartment , moreover all the shops ,cafes and restaurants are surrounded by the apartment , You will love your new home because of the apartment itself and its location , i cant wait to meet with you .

description:
Stylish, berlin-like bedroom with a lot of sunlight, a comfy bed for 2 and a big desk to work on. Our shared apartment feels like home, it's this typical apartment, with old wooden floors and a cute kitchen!
You share the whole apartment (bathroom+kitchen) with my 2 lovely roomies. We have a welcoming and quiet living atmosphere.
We live very close to the metro (U7) and the S-Bahn (Ring-Bahn), so it's super easy to come and go, BUT it can be noisy, so bring your earplugs for the night! ;)

name: Bright, spacious and with balcony in Berlin
description: I rent my beautiful room in Berlin. It is bright and spacious (generous desk and two sofas). The apartment is cozy and well equipped and my roomie is lovely. It is in the Friedrichshain district (Samariterkiez), very well connected. Surrounded by supermarkets, drugstores, cafes, restaurants, etc. Walking distance to Boxhagener platz, with its Saturdays' food market and the legendary Sundays flea market. No parties in the apartment are allowed, Berlin offers many party options, just go out ;)

name: Beautiful Berlin! A cosy room in a quiet district
description:
As a host of Airbnb I agreed to the special hygiene requirements due to the Covid pandemic to ensure the highest possible safety for my guests.

Quiet accommodation in a cozy old building apartment in West Berlin, which offers, in addition to the separate bedroom, a bay room, hammock, kitchen and bathroom with bathtub for shared use.
This is a cosy and quiet apartment in West Berlin that offers a single bedroom, a beautiful living room with Hifi and hammock as well as a kitchen and bathroom.

name: Renovated studio apartment with lush balcony
description:
Newly renovated, first floor, studio apartment in the heart of Friedrichshain. The apartment has everything you need including a fully-equipped kitchen, bedding, WiFi, and balcony.

5 minute walk to Warschauerstrasse S+U-Bahn, 15 minute walk to Boxhagener Platz for good food, bars and shopping. A scenic 15 minute stroll over Oberbaumbrücke and you're in lively Kreuzberg.

I will be away during your stay so you will have the apartment to yourself.

name: Zimmer mit Dachterrasse und pr. Bad in Tiergarten
description:
Quiet and clean room (10.5 sqm) with large closet, private access to the roof terrace with small pool. Guests have an area (lockable) to themselves, with private hallway, bathroom with bathtub and bedroom. The area is located in an old building apartment (170 sqm) in the attic. The open kitchen and living room are very spacious and freely available for shared use.

name: Dachtraum  - Stopover in the Attic
description:
The room is under rooftop with two large skylights to the quiet courtyard. It is equipped with the essentials. There is a bed on euro pallets (Berlin style), an open wardrobe as well as a desk.

There are four other students living in the big apartment. The large kitchen is equipped with everything necessary. Here you can cook and interact with the residents. In the large bathroom there is a washing machine, which you are also welcome to use.

name: Bright apartment in beautiful Friedrichshain
description:
This bright apartment is located in the beautiful area Friedrichshain, close to Kreuzberg - so a perfect location, especially for visitors coming for parties and exploring east and the centre of Berlin :-)
You will have your own big bedroom with a high ceiling. The double bed and the single bed allows 3 people.
Many restaurants, bars etc. are in the area - a big Späti (24/7 shop) is even right next to the apartment.

1 Fine room in the heart of Friedrichshain with 2 bathrooms an open living room / kitchen and 2 terraces (1 balcony and a rooftop terrace). You will be staying with Stefan, musician and artist manager, who also works in Berlin and will be happy to give you tips for the area.

Please take care of the the space and the things. No partying, no smoking in the room and cleanliness desired.

description: This room is part of our 63square meters apartment composed of 3 rooms (2 bedrooms and 1 living room). It is very cozy and well located. Located only 10mins walking from various public transports such as U-Bahn (U5), Ringbahn, S-Bahn-central lines, and many trams. The district has a lot to offer with plenty of restaurants, markets, shops, museums, and night-clubs. The flat is nevertheless very quiet since it is located in a calm street, with few cars and no nightlife.

name: PLANT FILLED APARTMENT IN NEUKÖLLN
description:
Hi, I am renting out my beautiful 2-rooms apartment located in Neukölln, Berlin. Located just 10 min from Kreuzberg and 20 min with the metro from the city center. There’s a lot of supermarkets, cafes and bars near by.

The apartment is bright and there’s a lot of plants. We love to decorate our apartment so that all our guests feel comfortable. We ourselves love to cook therefore we have a lot of kitchen utilities you can use.

description:
Hello everyone,
I am traveling to Mallorca for a Beachvolleyball-Camp for a couple of weeks and would like to offer my room while I'm gone. It's a nice & clean 25m² private room with a king-size bed (200x180) & a lot of space.
I'm living in a 135m² Shared Flat (4th floor) with Kristina, Joanna & Philipp (26-30), who are very fun to live with. They speak German, English and Russian. The tram station is only 1min away and it takes roughly 15-20min by train to go to the Center e.g. Alexanderplatz.

name: Nice and sunny room in the heart of the City West
description: The room has everything you need for a short stay. A comfortable double bed, a closet, a desk, a shelf, etc. It is part of a three-room apartment in which I live. It is located on the first floor and is quite sunny. The bathroom has a shower, a bath and a washing machine. The kitchen is well equipped, with fridge, dishwasher, microwave etc.

name: Room in central Berlin (West): Nollendorfplatz
description:
Co-host is Peter, he is looking forward to your visit.

The co-host is Peter, he is looking forward for your visit.

name: *BERLIN ENTSPANNT ERLEBEN*
description:
In the green Johannisthal, there is the tram and various bus lines/ night bus. The S-Bahn is also in walking distance. There's a latei in the house, a baker, and a very tasty burger shop. The Sparkasse and the post office are next door.
Without a change, you can reach the Silesian Gate directly by bus. Also Mitte and everything you can see in about 30 minutes.

name: Quiet & cosy room in Friedrichshain next to a park
description:
Hey! We will welcome you in our 4 room apartment in trendy Friedrichshain (130 sqm). U-S-Tram stops Warschauer Str. is 2-4 minutes away. We’re in the hot spot - grocery shopping, restaurants, cafés, markets, bars all around.
1 quiet and cosy room = 18sqm, facing a seldom used street the room is very quiet.
We speak German, French and English

very central yet quiet

close to subway stations, shopping centers, cafes, parks, canal, second hand shops, movie theaters, / hip multicultural international area

The mattress here is very simple. If you are huge or need a spacious Lux bed, maybe not this room.

The warm cooking (stove and oven) is not allowed. Now I am taking only female guests.

name: Lovely & Save Guest Room In Xberg (Females Only)
description:
Short-term bookings & extensions are possible. Please request via direct message.

I am subletting my fantastic, light filled super clean guest room (25 sqm) with a shared kitchen, bathroom, hallway & laundry room in my beautiful apartment with high ceilings, custom made stucco plaster, big windows & custom made doors right in the heart of Kreuzberg. The apartment is within walking distance to numerous cafés & restaurants. Most of Kreuzberg's eclectic club & bar scene is also located close by.

name: Zimmer in Penthouse-Wohnung mit privatem Bad
description: Situated in the trendy Friedrichshain district yet in a quiet side street, my luxurious and sunny apartment offers the privacy and relaxation you need after long Berlin days and nights. Four light rail (S-Bahn) lines, two subways, bus and tram lines are reachable on foot within 3-7 minutes. Just one stop down the line are the long-distance and regional stations Ostbahnhof and Ostkreuz, offering a speedy connection to BER airport in under 30 minutes. Potsdam is reachable by S-Bahn in 50 minutes.

name: Cozy, quiet, & large room in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description:
Stay in this charming room within a renovated Altbau apartment, in a building built in 1887 located in the lively Friedrichshain. One of Berlin's most popular neighborhoods.
The peaceful street ensures a quiet retreat for rest or work. Explore the vibrant neighborhood - Boxhagener Platz, just a 5-min walk, boasts lively bars, cafés, restaurants, and 24-hour shops. Weekends bring a delightful food market on Saturdays and a lively flea market on Sundays.

name: World’s 1st modular hotel atop a shopping centre
description: Our tripster rooms deliver 19sqm worth of spacious comfort and technological necessities! Located in the hip district of Friedrichshain, this hotel room is ideal for enjoying a chic stay in Berlin. The room has a comfortable double bed, modern bathroom and all you need from TV to Wifi and Air conditioning. We are located above the rooftops of Berlin, on top of a mall – yes you read that right. It doesn't get more Berlin than that.

Well situated near the Landwehrcanal, one of the most popular areas especially for sunsets at the Länderdreieck.

The apartment itself is located on a quiet street but very close to the beating heart of Kreuzberg and Neukölln with all the restaurants a, bars and culture.

name: Space Age Oase zwischen Humboldhain und Mauerpark
description:
A large room (30sqm) in a very central location .
A bedroom with pull-out couch (140 cm) and a cozy lounge seating area is rented. On request, a mattress can be added. TV and WLAN are also provided. The kitchen is fully equipped with many kitchen appliances and a dishwasher. The bathroom houses a bathtub and rain shower. You will usually be alone in the apartment as we will be abroad during this time.

name: Zimmer mit Charme nah am Kurfürstendamm.
description:
The characteristic of a hotel maison in Berlin is the private, even homey atmosphere, which is appealing for both business travelers and quiet vacationers.
The advantageous location of our house is a perfect start to Berlin's cultural and nightlife. Just a relaxing walk away are theatres, sights, restaurants, cafes as well as the famous Berlin shopping street Kurfürstendamm (about 50 m away) with numerous world-famous boutiques.

This space offers guest the unique experience of mostly being alone in the apartment, with limited access to their host.

The bathroom has a bath tub and you can enjoy beautiful street views and the and sunset from the balcony.

The kitchen can be used for breakfast or small things upon request. I live in the apartment and will usually be at home after work and always happy to help with any questions.

Located 50 m from Turmstraße metro station (5 min from S/U-Bahn station Zoo) and from the bus stop Turmstraße U-Bahn station (10 min from central station).

The room is fully equipped and towels are provided. The 40 square meters of kitchen-living room, both bathrooms and the 20 sqm balcony may be used. The shared apartment consists of 5 very friendly and open-minded people (all in their early 20s), who are happy to give you tips.

The apartment is it the coolest neighbourhood - Neukölln, 2 min from the S-Bahn (the train) "Sonnenallee".

name: Big Room with Balcony
description: Neukölln is the still authentic multicultural district of Berlin, with the most live music jam sessions and its heart Tempelhofer Feld an old abandoned airport with full access to all sports. Kreuzberg with its endless amounts of never closing clubs and urban nightlife is only a 10 minutes train ride away. This room is perfect for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. The flat has a big kitchen with lots of stuff in combination with a living room. In between is a big cool bar. It has a very nice atmosphere is very close to the trainstation with very good connections to the center. There is a straight train to Alexanderplatz or Friedrichstr.
I have two roommates. One is not at home from Monday morning to Thursday evening. The other one can help you with lots of stuff.
You would sleep in my room. I am travelling a lot so that’s why I rent my room sometimes.

We rent out the living room in a 85m2 flat in a 19th century building. You can use the garden during summer.

The flat is located 2-5 min. from metro/suburban train stations, and short bike rides to many of the cities sights. The district is Schöneberg, nice & residential with different markets on weekends and cafés/restaurants around.

Please note that 2 cats live here, in case of allergies. Only bookings from people with previous AirBnB ratings will be accepted. Thx!

I'm renting out a cosy room in our charming flat.

- 5 min to the nearest bus

The apartment itself offers two rooms a separate bedroom and a living room with a kitchen and a balcony

It is my private room. I let it for those days because I'm traveling and don't have money for the train ticket ;) I hope that you can feel at home there, too. Most of my stuff will be accommodated in the rooms of M. and F. so that you can spread your belongings as you please. Reinickendorf is not directly in the center of Berlin, but you can reach the main station in 28 min ;)
There are 3 supermarkets round the corner and a lake (20 min walk).
Wir sprechen auch deutsch.

1 bedroom (with double bed or kids room with single beds) and private bathroom in a modern flat on 2 levels. Big terrace 40 m2. Wonderful view. You will share the living room, the kitchen and the terrace with our family (sometime we have a dog with us).
Kastanienallee, Mauerpark, Kollwitzplatz, Alexanderplatz, Kulturbrauerei, flea market , little Boutiques, bars, restaurants and clubs around.
12 minutes tram from central station. Metro U2 Eberswalder Strasse is 5 minutes walk.

name: Room in the best area of Kreuzberg
description:
Room is located in the fancy part of the most regarded district (Kreuzberg), close to everything you'll need while you're visiting Berlin. Very well-connected to any part of the city. 5 min walk from 2 subway stations. Perpendicular of Bergmannstraße where all the shops and restaurants are located. It has a big market 2 minutes walk every weekend. Also 7 minutes walk to Tempelhofer Feld.

The room is 18 sq/m, also bathroom, kitchen, living room and balcony for you to use as you please.

name: Sunny bright room in Schöneberg
description:
The apartment is in Schöneberg, a very nice and central neighbourhood. There is a street market every Wednesdays and Saturdays right outside, restaurants and bars are right around the corner. Tiergarten - the biggest park of Berlin - is almost in walking distance aswell as the Ku'damm.
You will love my place because of the brightness, the big living space, the crazy architecture of the building and the super quiet and central location (it's like a bubble in the city)

name: Furnished Room Near EastSideGallery

Warm and furnished bedroom with desk, chair, etc in a young and vibrant area of Berlin.
Typical Berlin style flat with wooden floors and high ceilings.

Hello!
I live in the centre of Berlin. The great advantage of this room is the surrounding, you're at Potsdamer Platz, KadeWe and Wittenbergplatz in 5 min, Brandenburger Tor in 10. The central line u2 is 3 min walking distance!

description: You live near by the canal Maybachufer with many lovely cafes and bars around you. My place is in the vibrant district Neukölln, Hasenheide Park is a 15 minute walk away - you can go for a picnic or relax with a book. Also there is Hamy - best Vietnamese noodle soup in town! Griessmühle club is also in walking distance. Twice a week Maybachufer Market where you can get fresh vegetables and fruits very cheap; the vibe is so lovely! On Saturday is fleamarket. Everything just around the corner!

Your room is quiet and has a comfortable double bed.

Many public transport in only 5 minutes walking distance (U7, U8, M41, S42).

I am from Berlin and therefore I'll gladly give some information about the city and surrounding.

Looking forward to hosting you!

Best,

There is a great public transportation to the main train station (15 min bus), TXL airport (15 min bus), Alex (30 min bus) and a lot of nice, affordable restaurants around.

Welcome.

Since the apartment is situated in Willibald-Alexis-Str. you will be able to enjoy quiet nights but are still able to reach the famous Bergmannstr. with all its bars, restaurants and shops in only three minutes by foot.

name: Bright room with private bathroom & very fast WiFi
description:
Hi, I'm Francesco and I welcome you to my home in Friedrichshain. The flat is newly-built, 110sqm large and has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and very fast WiFi. One bedroom and one bathroom will be for your private use (the bed can be used both as a single or a double).
It's a bright and comfortable flat with many plants, facing a quiet park and close to many supermarkets, restaurants, bars, cafes, and public transport options.
You'll love the liveliness of the neighborhood and how cozy the flat is!

name: Rare Find: Central & Quiet Room + Private Balcony
description:
Welcome to our place in Berlin! Our guest room is located in a quiet street in a very central area around the well-known shopping streets Schlossstrasse in Berlin Steglitz.

In 20 min with a direct S-Bahn and U-Bahn connection, it is not far away to many sights such as the Brandenburg Gate, Ku'damm and many other great locations.

The area is well maintained and safe, pleasant and you can find everything you need within less than 5 minutes walk, including shopping malls just around the corner.

Good connection via public transport (bus 1 min., metro 10 min., train 15 min. walking distance)
Altstadt Spandau, Spandauer Arkaden and train station just 1,7km away, 5 min. by bus.

name: Luminous Loft Apartment Room
description:
We rent our beautiful attic apartment in the south-west of Berlin. The house is not far from the Grunewald and some of the most beautiful lakes in Berlin, a perfect starting point for relaxing city explorations.

Luminous loft apartment room in beautiful south-west Berlin. The house is located close to many lakes and a wonderful forest. It is perfect to discover the city from this relaxing and family friendly neighbourhood.

Our street is very quietly located, not far from the beautiful Zion Church and many bars, restaurants, cafes and small boutiques. The center of Berlin can be wonderfully explored by foot or by bike.

name: Live the high life of Berlin
description: The light-flooded studio on the top floor is perfect to enjoy a few hours of sun on the balcony, or to spend time together in this well-equipped and quiet place. You can watch TV from the bed or sofa. If you have an account, you can enjoy streaming services, such as Netflix, YouTube, Amazon Prime, etc and have great movie nights. A small desk is available where you can get some work done if necessary, before enjoing the evening in the surrounding restaurants and bars. For sleeping, a comfortable double bed awaits you, in which you can recharge for the next day.

The apartment is located directly at Schillerpark! A huge park, perfect for running, having picnics or BBQs...
There is a bus (Glasgowerstrasse) and u-bahn station (Seestrasse/ Rehberge) close by.

The Gründerzeithaus, built in 1915, is protected as a monument. From here you have a wonderful view of the green park of Rüdesheimer Platz and the neubarock "Siegfriedbrunnen" or the indoor garden green with trees.

Perfect transport connections, the tram is right outside the door, S Bahn/Ringbahn are within walking distance, proximity to Alexanderplatz.

name: beautiful city room in the heart of Kreuzberg
description:
Kreuzberg is not only known for its unique charm and the most beautiful parks, but also for the typical Berlin apartments in old buildings.

Our apartment offers through large rooms and high ceilings a lot of space and freedom and immediately gives you the carefree Berlin lifestyle.

For an authentic Berlin stay, our individually designed apartment, in the trendy Bergmannkiez in the heart of Kreuzberg, is the perfect base for your Berlin experience.

Breakfast can be offered additionally, 5 EUR/person.

The bedroom is turned to the inside of the yard where it is really quiet, and the room is provided with automatic blinds and floor heating, like the whole apartment. You have your private bathroom with bathtub right behind your room. Your room and so also your bathroom are lockable. There is a Steinway grand piano and a balcony. Rain shower, super markets and public transport close by.

- Location is perfect: a quiet street just steps from Frankfurter Tor

- Fully equipped kitchen for all your cooking needs
- Fast, above average internet speed (250 Mbps)

There is a train station 10 mins walking and a subway station about 15 mins walking distance as well as Busses which makes every part of the city easily reachable.

name: Quiet room in Mitte

The place is very well connected with public transportation: 5 minutes walk from subway station Osloer Straße (U8 and U9) and a couple of minutes from tram and bus lines.

Not far there is a Lidl supermarket, some restaurants and bars.

The room is part of an apartment shared with another tenant.

A shrine room is open to those interested to visit, meditate and linger.

With the world's most famous garden architect Enzo Enea, a green retreat was created, an oasis in the middle of a central location.

Die Beschreibung auf Deutsch findet ihr unten

Double bed (140×200),workplace, with private bathroom and terraces/ garden access, as well as possibility to use infrared sauna (10€ including bathrobe) .
Berlin Mitte (Alexanderplatz) 15 km,in 30min m U-S-Bahn,
close to the forest and river , 3 minutes to the bus, the S-Bahn Köpenick directly into the city, parking in front of the house, free of charge!

It is a spacious room with 25m2 with Wi-Fi directly on a major street and thus centrally located on traffic with trams, buses and S-Bahn. Within walking distance is also a large park. Berlin-Schönefeld Airport is only 30 minutes by train. In the room there are many storage options for lots of clothes if you want to stay longer.

With a private balcony, cozy reading nook and high quality workspace in a mindful neighborhood, this is the perfect retreat for travellers who want to feel at home and want to be part of Berlin's creative flair.

The entrance to the apartment is a bit unusual and done through the bathroom😁.

The apartment is mixed furnished Art Deco, 70èr years and Moroccan.
We are right at Viktoria- Luise Platz, subway, restaurant, cafe and the famous market on Winterfeldtplatz.
Schöneberg is a very popular neighborhood, very lively, international, urban and very Berlin...

The apartment on the second floor and is shared with other guests. It has three shared bathrooms and one shared kitchen.

I'm looking forward to having you!

I moved to my new place a year ago after a complete renovation. Happy to share it with whoever has appreciation and respect for a cool flatmate, big spaces and great design.

Many nice bars, restaurants and parks a few minutes away. Most of the top spots and places to be in Neukölln are just a couple of minutes walking distance.

name: Private room in shared apartment with friendly dog
description:
This listing is for a private bedroom in my apartment where I also live with my friendly dog (see photos).

Enjoy your stay in my beautiful apartment in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg. Located within 5 minutes of Schönhauser Allee S/U metro station, tram stop, shopping centre, bars, and restaurants, and less than 10 minutes by metro to Alexanderplatz, the apartment is the perfect base for you to discover Berlin.

name: Nice room in a bright attic apartment
description: In my bright attic apartment, there is a beautiful free room for 2 people. It has a 140 cm bed, two dressers and a small couch. A coat rack ensures order, and there is a refrigerator, kettle, coffee maker, and dishes for daily use. Additionally, many great plants create a pleasant atmosphere. The TV offers Amazon Prime and Netflix, and there are plenty of power outlets.

name: Lovely accommodation in Berlin
description: The flat is located in the middle of the vibrant district Berlin-Friedrichshain. If you step out of the house, you're surrounded by restaurants, bars and clubs. But the flat is quiet and peacfull, because it's in the rear house.

name: Großes Doppelzimmer in zentrumsnahem Haus
description:
The double room has a large bed (1.80×2.00 m), as well as its own small bathroom (not ensuite). Both are located on the ground floor, adjacent to the open kitchen, the living area with fireplace and the garden. You are welcome to use our kitchen (coffee machine!) or sit on the sofa with a glass of wine.

Downtown can be reached in 10 minutes by public transport (U6, S-Bahn). The connection is also perfect by train (Südkreuz train station) and car (city highway).

name: Cosy Berlin artsy apartment
description:
Be at home at a cosy and quite Altbau apartment in Schillerkiez, one of Berlin‘s most beloved and vibrant neighbourhoods. This inviting shared flat offers a soulful and warm ambience. Within a brief 5 min. stroll you can be either at Tempelhofer Feld or the subway station Leinestraße.
Discover the vibrant local scene with an array of cafes, restaurants and boutiques.
It’s the perfect balance of urban energy and peaceful green surroundings.

Shout out to fellow LGBTQIA+ people! ❤️

name: Huge, sunny room (U-bahn Boddinstraße Neukölln)
description: The room is 24sqm in a traditional high-sealing ,,Altbau", with a double bed and very bright. It is in a 2 Person flat share with a large, clean kitchen which you are also welcome to use. Great location in Neukölln, 1 min from Boddinst U-bahn (U8), also 1 min from Hasenheide one of the nicest parks in Berlin and 5 min from Tempelhofer Feld, the former airport, that got turned into a park/sport/chillout area.

name: Gold Palais Hotel - EZ mit Balkon Ruhig & Zentral
description:
Your hotel in Berlin - A good day is no coincidence!
Whether you are on a short break or a business trip, alone, as a couple, in a family or in a group – at the Gold Palais Hotel you are always right. Located in the border triangle between Mitte, Friedrichshain and Prenzlauer Berg, our charming hotel with its green garden, even greener Volkspark and stylish Berlin backyard is the right starting point for every day!

The apartment has old wooden parquet and floorboards, designer furniture, spacious bathroom, dishwasher, washing machine - BUT NO WIFI!

The huge privat room (nearly 40qm) is part of a ground floor spacious flat in the heart of Neukölln. The room has everything what you need: coat stands, a sofa bed a chair and table for having breakfast, a comfortable double bed and a huge working desk.

A lovely bright room in a nicely renovated apartment close to lively Weserstrasse and further down the road is the Landwehrkanal, perfect for an evening drink in the summertime. Large windows allow the sun to stream in in the mornings and a perfect place to sit and relax.

Rathaus Neukölln (U7) is 300m away but you can also have use of my bike to explore the city.

Right at the heart of Neukölln! As colourful, lively, exciting and multi-cultural as Berlin gets!

Berlin is one of the most inspiring and fascinating cities to be and live in...a bit of curiosity and open-mindedness can turn every single day into an unexpected and refreshing adventure!

Likewise beautiful in its imperfection & slightly out of the ordinary, there's no better room & flat to start out your stay!

Enjoy!

A shrine room is open to those interested to visit, meditate and linger.

Separate living and sleeping area, bed directly under the skylight. Bright, partly converted under the ridge kitchen with oven, stove, microwave and dishwasher. Shower room with tub and washer. Bicycle use possible, Berlin Wall Memorial and Rosenthaler Platz are very close.

name: Design room near canal in the hip areas of Berlin
description: We are living in a lively area nearby the canal and you will have lots of little cafés, restaurants, bars and supermarkets within walking distance. You can stroll along the streets, check out garments, little stands, have some food at the Turkish street market on Tuesdays or Fridays or just eat outside everyday as there's lots of cheap and good places. We are always happy to give you recommendations and help wherever we can.

name: 1 Room in Artist Flat for Rent
description:
I'm offering a bright and spacious room for rent from Feb. 10 - 21 (also
flexible) during Berlinale Film Festival.

The place itself is a beautiful artist's flat, well-furnished and styled.

I'll be happy to provide more info, just ask me.

name: Klein aber Oho!
description:
Cozy little apartment in the Lichtenberger Kiez.
Very nice neighbors.
Super connections to the public
Transportation by bus, subway, public transport and
Tram.
In Weitlingstraße there are many shops, nice restaurants and also some bars.
Not even a five-minute walk away, there is an Edeka, which is also on Sonn and
Public holidays until 10 pm.
You have the whole place to yourself. I will not be in the apartment, always available for questions.
Enjoy your stay! :)

name: Big Room in Berlin-Kreuzberg, sunny
description: Between "Görlitzer Park" and U-Bahn " Schlesisches Tor". The apartment is on the fifth floor. Twoo young friendly dancers living here, speaking good spain,  english, some french,  germain . The apartment is  nice and cosy. Good beds, big bath, Bars.

name: Lovely two bed room in Schoeneberg
description: Centrally big room in typical Berlin old building surrounded by a lovely neighborhood. To catch up with the berlin lifestyle there is a very good public transport connection. Shopping possibilities are close and a supermarket which is open daily.

name: Private room in a penthouse in the heart of PBerg.
description:
Private room in a penthouse in the heart of PBerg.

- 1min walking distance to train station / U-Bahn & Straßenbahn.
- Dozens of restaurants, food stalls, bakeries, and bars within 5min walking distance.
- Mauerpark 5min walking distance.
- New apartment with sophisticated sound isolation.
- Shared flat with entrepreneurs and investors from the Berlin startup ecosystem, very international and open-minded.
- Private room, shared kitchen, and open office (two-floor apartment).

name: Cozy, quiet Pan's Labyrinth room in the centre
description: Quiet, cozy room with unique Pan's Labyrinth design in Prenzlauer Berg. With window overlooking big park. Feels like in the countryside, while being in the centre of Berlin (TV tower is visible from flat). Lots of stylish bars, cafes, restaurants nearby. Alexander Platz/TV tower only 2 tram stations away. Tram stop is in front of the house. Perfect base for sight seeing trips, for couples or business travelers.

name: Room in Moabit near central station
description:
Most of the time my flatmate isnt at home.

You also can use the washing machine and the kitchen.

We don’t smoke, but you can smoke in the kitchen if you want :)

Text me for special arrival times.. also for any other question.

Deutsch/English

PS: Bad rating of first booking was a misunterstanding and my fault. But pls dont worry.

name: Bright bedroom in Kreuzberg
description:
The room is simple and functionally furnished It provides a heater that you control yourself. Thanks to the wifi and desk, you can work comfortably. My apartment is within walking distance of the popular Bergmannkiez and two minutes from the famous Kreuzberg in Viktoriapark.

Cozy room is furnished and has a thermostat. Wifi and desk make it a comfortable work space. My apartment is in walking distance to popular Bergmannstraße with many bars/restaurants and the famous Kreuzberg.

name: Cozy room in familiar commune in Grunewald
description:
Your room lying on the second floor of our 4 level commune home gives a good location for short and long-term trips to Berlin.
Close to Ku'Damm and Fair, Forest over the street, calm area with kids friendly yard around the house. In summer our small garden invites you to relax. Bus and S-Bahn available in few minutes.
You share kitchen, bathrooms and living room with us (6 people between 1 and 46) and get a delicious breakfast (+7,50€ p.Person) if you want to.

name: Private Room 22qm close to Alexander Platz
description:
20m, bright, own, private room in typical berlin apartment.
Very central, in the middle of the pulsating city.
Bed 100*200cm incl. bed linen and towels and nice sofa.
Third floor, no elevator and directly in front of the house is the streetcar station M4.
Around the corner Beautiful Park Friedrichshain, lots of shops, cafes, restaurants, bars. Alexander Platz (City Center) is only 8 minutes away by streetcar.
VEGETARIAN HOUSEHOLD :) 💓

name: Mitbewohnerin gesucht ( ab 13. Dezember)
description:
It's a 45 m2 apartment in Zehlendorf, a quiet and well-kept area in Berlin.

The apartment itself is lighted. Your room has 10 m2.

name: Berlin apartment room close to Volkspark F-Hain
description:
I am offering a furnished 10m2 room that has a window to the balcony. 
The room has a bed, desk, rail, and a small cabinet.
The flat has a well equipped kitchen if you are interested in cooking for yourself.

Disclaimer: I chose the check-in time "flexible" since I don't have a set schedule yearround. You have to communicate your prefered check-in time and we will find a nice solution. :)

name: Quiet bedroom for two people
description: We offer one bedroom with one sofabed (2 mattresses). We are walking distance from the stations Innsbrucker Platz (U4 and S-Bahn circle line) and Bundesplatz (U9, S-Bahn). The nearby train line S1 in Friedenau takes you to Brandenburger Tor and Reichstag in less than 15 minutes. The connection to the airport is easy & fast. You will love our place because of the leafy, quiet streets. Our flat is good for tourists, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Room in Berlin Prenzlauer Berg, central located
description:
I rent a 18m² room in my apartment in the district of Pankow / Prenzlauer Berg. The room is fully furnished with a big bed, table, 4 chairs, various shelves & garderobe. Not for interim rent or long term.

NOTE: Construction work is currently taking place in our building, which may lead to noise disturbances. The house is currently scaffolded. However, no work takes place directly in front of the window.

name: Comfy double Bedroom Berlin central
description:
After a long Day in the crazy city of berlin you can relax in my huge and comfy room. It´s only 3 min. to the Ubahn station "Weberwiese" and only 2 Stations to Alexanderplace.

#doublebed #view in the green backyard #silent but central

name: Berliner Altbau modern gelebt.
description: The beautiful spacious old building apartment is in the center of Kreuzberg directly at Viktoriapark. From the bed you can look at the Kreuzberg. In the immediate vicinity are numerous great restaurants and bars as well as the legendary Bergmannstrasse. You can also walk to the closed Tempelhof Airport in just a few minutes. My roommates are the perfect hosts and can give you tips in the city.

name: Nice room near airport — fireplace
description: Welcome to our spacious, comfy place conveniently located near airport, Hbf, and most tourist attractions (Reichstag, Brandenburger Tor, Checkpoint Charlie...). Your room has a big comfy American hotel-style box spring bed, a fireplace & balcony.

name: 2 Bedroom Design-Penthouse by Suite.030
description:
The apartments are furnished in the latest comfort standard. In addition, a fully equipped kitchen, daylight bathroom with a rain shower & underfloor heating. In addition, each apartment has a terrace. The furniture is high quality and timeless, furnished with design classics from Vitra, HAY and USM Haller.
Internet, Smart TV and sound systemare self-contained. Technically, it is also "State of the Art" with smart home payments from digital electricity, Loewe TV and Sonos sound system.

name: Casa Bau Haus
description:
The accommodation is located in a building, part of the 'Weiße Stadt' quarter built in the Bauhaus style in the early 20th century and protected from Unesco.

The accommodation is only a 3-minute walk from the U8 Paracelsus Bad underground station.

The quarter is quiet, and a few supermarkets and Bäckerei are only a few minutes' walk away.

name: Small room nearby airport & sights
description: Welcome to our spacious, comfy place conveniently located near airport, central station, and most tourist attractions (Reichstag, Brandenburger Tor, Checkpoint Charlie, Memorial for the Jews). This is a small & inexpensive room in our big apartment.

name: Bright & Spacious Room in the Heart of Moabit
description:
Enjoy a bright and spacious private room in the heart of Berlin! Our beautiful Altbau home features 3m high ceilings decorated with intricate stucco, and plenty of natural light streams in from the room's two large windows.

Located only 20-minutes by foot from the central train station, the peaceful neighborhood of Moabit offers a quiet place to rest, work, or unwind after a day exploring the city. Within walking distance are many stores, restaurants, and Fritz-Schloss Park.

name: Schönes Zimmer / Nice room  - Tiergarten / Moabit
description:
Small and fine 14m² room for sleeping and working in Mitte (Moabit) with good connections through U Hansaplatz (U9) and S Tiergarten (3/5/9/75).

Small and nice 14m² room for sleeping and working in Mitte (Moabit) well connected by subway (U9 Hansaplatz) and train (S Tiergarten, 3/5/9/75).

name: Guest room in modern apartment/ Gästezimmer
description:
Single bedroom in a 2 bedroom apartment with its own balcony. Big windows and very bright and secure blinds for the night.
Next door is a very good Italian restaurant and across the street a bakery and a wine shop with great wines.
5 minute walk from U5 Samariterstraße metro station and 7 minute walk from Frankfurter Allee S-Bahn station.
Ein Zimmer für 2 Pers.
Eigener Balkon. Weniger als 5 min bis zur U-Bahnstation Samariterstraße (U5) und etwa 7 min bis zur S-Bahn Frankfurter Allee

name: Room "Wild wild Wedding" (+piano)
description: The room is large and so is the balkony. Large windows = lots of light. You are welcome to play the piano if you like. No complaints about or from the neigbours yet, rather the contrary (generally as well as concerning the piano). The Bed is soft.

name: Blick auf den Fernsehturm
description: Light-flooded room overlooks the TV tower in a central location of Friedrichshains. The apartment has a large living space with lots of plants and a simple kitchen. Adjacent to the room and living area is a terrace with views across the neighborhood. The situation is quiet and well connected.

name: \\Comfortable In Friedrichshain//
description:

name: Room for 2 in Prenzlauer Berg
description: We offer you one big, friendly designed room for two people: It's about 20 m² big and you can of course feel free to use the kitchen and the bathroom as well. We're located right at Volkspark Friedrichshain.

name: Schöne Wohnung in Berlin
description:
Cozy apartment in Berlin Treptow - Köpenick in Oberschöneweide.
The apartment is in the immediate vicinity of the Volkspark Wuhlheide and thus close to the university for technology and the economy and close to the Ernst Busch Schauspielschule. The apartment has high walls with stucco.

name: In the heart of Berlin, Tiergarten
description:
The apartment is a typical Berlin Altbau, quiet and lovely.
The place is only 2 bus stops away from Hauptbahnhof, Bundestag, Brandenburger Tor, Bellevue, Tiergarten & Spree (U-Bahn/Buses are right infront of the door)
10min by bus to Tegel airport.

name: big cosy room in Berlin Wilmersdorf
description:
Bright large room in Berlin-Wilmersdorf!
Room in a 2-persons-flat. 25m2 with big windows and a cosy couch. The bathroom and the kitchen are entirely renovated. You will find a washing machine and everything you need.
You reach everything in 5 minutes walk! The next metro station, supermarket (open 24/6), pharmacy, bank, restaurants, fastfood, bike rent. 35 min to the main station, 15min to Ku'damm. The neighborhood is green and quiet and close to Schöneberg.

name: Zweibettzimmer in Berlin Zentrum im 3* Hotel
description: If you want to get to know Berlin from a local perspective, this is your place! Experience the alternative Berlin atmosphere in our great location right on Hermannplatz! All major attractions of Berlin's nightlife in Kreuzberg and Neukölln such as bars, cafes, pubs and clubs are within walking distance of us.

Well-connected to the U-bahn and buses, and the S-bahn is just one stop or a 10-minute walk away.

name: Room with shared Kitchen & Bath
description:
Room with large east facing windows in a comfortable apartment with shared kitchen, living lounge, and bathroom. The room is furnished with a double bed, a desk with drawers, an office chair, and a drawers chest. A washing machine is available to be used by the guests.
The area is very well connected with the public transport network. Plenty of options for shopping, food, drinks, fitness, sports, other outdoor activities, are all available within walking range.

name: Charming big apartment right by the Spree river
description: Out charming apartment is right by the Spree river in the district of Charlottenburg. We have a kitchen, a bathroom with shower and bath tub, a living room, a dining room and a nice balcony with a view of the Berlin TV Tower. You can walk by the river to Tiergarten Park and to the impressive Park of Charlottenburg Castle. On your way, you'll pass my supermarkets, a beergarden, some restaurants and bars. The train station and the bus to Berlin's central station are within walking distance.
