description:
Cozy, bright, centrally located room, with comfortable sofa bed for two, TV and dining table.
A trustworthy cat also lives here.
I want guests to feel at home with me, and so far this has probably worked out. :)

Cozy, bright, centrally located room, with a comfortable sofa bed for 2, a TV and a dining table.
So, a cuddly cat lives here.
I want my guests to feel at home, and I think it's been working so far. :)

name: Nice Cozy Room in Green Area
description:
The flat is located at 9th floor, has a super view in a green area is very near from the center in the beloved neighbourhood of Prenzlauer Berg, only 12 min. till Alexanderplatz with bus.

There are a lot of supermarkets 5-10 min. away by walking, 3 parks and a lot of tourist attractions and night life just 15 min. away.

There are buses just in front of the house, trams and metros are only 5-6 min. away by walking.
Enjoy your staying in Berlin! ;)

name: Cozy and bright room with King bed in central city
description: We offer a beautiful room in an old apartment with a balcony and perfect view. ( ELEVATOR is provided!!! - just behind the stairs after you enter the building) The nearest station is only about 3 minutes away from our door. Of course I would say Schöneberg is the best district in Berlin but see for yourself and experience our wonderful "Kiez". You will have your own big room and you can always use our kitchen and living room. Some of the pics are a bit older but I try to keep everything updated.

description:
You can host my room which has 25qm in a 87qm flat with a garden in the centre of Berlin.
A very big kitchen and bathroom can be used in share with my very kind flatmate.

A lot of supermarkets are close to the apartment.

You can reach Friedrichstraße within 10 minutes, Kurfürstendamm 9 minutes, Kreuzberg 15 minutes. 5 minutes walking to U9/U6.
12 minutes walking to S+U Wedding.

We sublet one room in our apartment. It has an seperate entrance, so you can come whenever you want :)

description:
The Apartment is located in the very nice area of Berlin-Steglitz, there are many cafes and small shops all around, supermarkets, restaurants and a wonderful park (Stadtpark). Every bus from here brings you to Rathaus Steglitz in 3 Minutes (3 stops), from there you can go to every part of Berlin with the Metro-U9 and the Train-S1.

Check-in Sa, Su, possible from 2pm.

name: Big and comfortable room in Kreuzberg!
description:
Big, furnished and comfortable room in Kreuzberg (city center). The room has around 18m2, the whole apartment is around 80 m2; Feel free to cook in our well equipped kitchen, chill in our cozy living room or our balcony.
You will shared the apartment with my lovely flatmate.

name: 2 Bedrooms in Spacious apartment in Kreuzberg
description:
Two bedrooms in a large and beautiful apartment. With 2 toilets and 1 shower. We won’t be around much so you’ll basically have the place for yourselves :)
Location is very central, walking distance to many galleries and museums. Bus stop is in front of the building. U2, U6, and U8 metro stations are at walking distance.
We are happy to share with you advice and suggestions about the city and cultural events.

name: Bright and quiet 30m² room with balkony
description:
Room with balkony (3m²) to the south. The Flat has (81m²). Neuköllen Friedrichshain and the Görlitzerpark are in walking distance. Many supermarkets and small coffee places around.

At night it is realy quite, so you can sleep with open windows. Over the day, you have dirket sunlight, from 10 am till 8pm.

Everything is allowed, as long as you don´t destroy anything or make the neighbours mad at us.

You gone love the neigberhoud and the room because of the sunlight the high ceilings.

description:
This huge flat invites crazy people, party queens, quite souls, lovely beings, musicians, artists, every kind of people to stay.
The almost 30 square meters room is part of a 200 qm big flat with very beautiful people living in there.
The room is perfect for couples - the bed is really big. The flat is located in Lichtenberg in the east of Berlin, really near to Friedrichshain. The areas Kreuzberg, Neukölln and Prenzlauer Berg are really easy to reach as well.

name: Lovely apartment in wooden design at Yorck Straße
description:
Hello and welcome to Berlin,
do you look for a wonderful place to live and discover berlin in short ways? Then my apartment might be the right location for you. The flat offers you the opportunity to live in a wonderful wooden made up place in the geografic middle of Berlin. The neighbourhood of Schöneberg directly at the border to Kreuzberg is famous for beautyful parks (Gleisdreieck, Victoria) and nice scene areas like Bergmann Kiez with art shops, restaurants and bars.

name: Your calm space in trending neighborhood
description: The bedroom is part of a wonderful spacious flat with a great light-flooded kitchen with balcony. Kitchen and bathroom are shared. The room is comfortable and homely furnished.

name: Zimmer in heller Wohnung
description:
Welcome to the guest room of my beautiful, bright apartment! The room faces south to the sunny courtyard and has direct access to the balcony.

We share these rooms:
- Large living room with two beds and TV, also access to the balcony
- Kitchen with cozy sitting area, dining table, microwave, stove, oven, dishwasher...
- En-suite bathroom with Shower, washing machine

I myself live in the other bedroom, but I am often not there.
Feel at home!

name: schönes Zimmer in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
I rent my room (20m2) in a beautiful two-person apartment right in the super cool, very popular Prenzlberger Kiez.
The apartment is well connected to public transportation and also well located for cyclists.

name: Huge bright room in classic Berlin Altbau
description:
The apartment is a classic Berlin Altbau with high ceilings. The room itself is quite large (26 qm) and has a double bed, a couch, and a desk (all pictured). You'll share the apt with 2 lovely roommates.

The neighborhood is lively, with bars and restaurants and people dining outside even on weeknights. There is a small park between between the apt and Ostkreuz station where there are always people hanging out.

Ostkreuz station is a 5 minute walk from the apartment and will get you anywhere.

name: Experience Berlin. Shared-Flat: Historic & modern!
description:
*This is a room in a shared flat with host; host prefers only 1 guest at a time & guests who have positive reviews from previous stays*
**Please have a complete profile with proper ID verifications with Airbnb**
***Host is allergic to cigarette smoke, so no smoking allowed, & no pets***

Do you want the classic Berlin-Mitte experience from start to finish?
Enjoy sophisticated modern ambience in a historic building, while staying in the very center.

name: Cozy room with double bed in artist flat share
description: #LGBTQIA+ #POC #CYBORGS inclusive. Cozy room with double bed facing back yard in old style Berlin flat in Kreuzberg. Best location to discover Berlin! Great lively area with cafés, restaurants, bars and the huge Görlitzer park on the doorstep. The three of us in the house are all working in contemporary performing arts (dance, choreography, circus, music.. ). We love to have guests!

name: big bright room in Friedrichshain great location!

As I myself just moved to Berlin the furniture is completely new and awaits your visit. The Apartment is situated in a quiet side street of the Torstraße, halfway between Rosenthaler Platz and Rosa-Luxenburg-Platz. If you stay here, you are sure to make the most out of your Berlin experience no matter if you are a foody, party animal or artsy - you are welcomed.

name: Cosy Bright Room in Kreuzberg
description:
Cosy, bright room right in the heart of Kreuzberg bordering Neukölln area. The apartment is located right between Gorlitzer and the Kanal, a well sort out area for both locals and tourists. It is a short walk to restaurants, bars and cafe´s in Neukölln.

Two other lovely housemates will be sharing the common areas with you and will make you feel right at home.

name: Cozy home in the❤️of Berlin

name: Lichtdurchflutetes Loft in Kreuzberg
description: Our beautiful large apartment is based in the heart of Kreuzberg one corner away from the famous Landwehrkanal. High ceilings, wooden floor, light-flooded open rooms and a large terrace make your stay in Berlin most comfortable and cozy. Perfect for families.

name: Great room with balcony in Schöneberg
description: The room is in Berlin-Friedenau at the U Walther-Schreiber-Platz in a silent street. It has a great bed, balcony, piano, TV, couch and max. space for 2-4 persons (optional sleeping couch). Bathroom, washing mashine and kitchen are available for all persons in the flat. There is also a fridge in the room, just for you! A supermarket (REWE) and the U-Bahn are only 150 meters away! The Schlosßstraßencenter is right around the corner and has a great flair for shopping (Primark, Hollister, etc...).

name: Lovely & spacious bedroom in a hip area Neukolln
description:
Very spacious bedroom in a cool apartment, friendly, liberal and respectful environment. Fully furnished room with two windows in old Berlin style,
fresh bed sheets and towels.
View into the quiet, sunlit backyard.

Big bathroom with two windows, tub/shower and washing machine.
Second floor without elevator, close to transport S/U-bahn (10 minutes) and bus in front of the house.
Close to shops, restaurants, parks, canal, bars etc.

Willkommen!

name: cozy and bright room in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
The flat is located in under the roof of an old building in the neighborhood of Winskiez in the middle of Prenzlauer Berg, close to Kollwitzplatz and the park Friedrichshain, only 15 mins (with publy transport) from Alexanderplatz.
You will stay in a comfortable and bright room (south side) for one or two people to stay with access to the green balcony.

name: Ruhiges Zimmer am Stadtrand
description:
The room is especially suitable for short city visits to relax after exploring the city in the quiet surroundings of Berlin.

The apartment is located on the outskirts of the city, but after a walk to Lichterfelde West station you are quickly at the center of the city.

Please note that there is also a cat living in the apartment. So if you don't tolerate cats that can also be noisy at night, you should use a different accommodation. 🐱

name: Zimmer frei in Prenzlauerberg
description:
search for an intermediate tenant for one month for my room in a very nice 3-person shared apartment in Prenzlauer Berg, as I am traveling to Southeast Asia for one month.
My roommate Klara (26) is studying camera

name: One bed in my livingroom

The flat has a bath tub, a welcoming kitchen, a lift and a balcony, you are allowed to use as well.

Your room is my living room.
You can relax between my plants in the comfortable armchairs.
There is a single mattress and a chabby couch you can sleep at.

name: Cozy Zimmer in Altbau-Wohnung
description: The room is one of six of a spacious old Berlin apartment. So far we have rented the whole apartment - please look at my other listing, here you can see the 5-star reviews. The apartment is well connected to the public transport network, in only 30 minutes you are at the Olympia Stadium.  Although the apartment is centrally located, it is still quiet here. In the immediate vicinity you will find everything you need: supermarket, bakery and restaurants & cafes.

name: Cosy Flat in Rixdorf (NEUKÖLLN)

Single bed and desk. Possibility to add extra mattress
Cosy apartment with relaxed roommates.
Close to U7 Rathaus Neukolln / Bus.

description:
--- From 3 months rental period/ Only for business travelers and students (no tourists) ---

Live in a modern equipped design apartment in the historic Stalin buildings near Frankfurter Tor with views over the rooftops of Berlin. In addition to the kitchen and bathroom, the apartment has two similarly equipped living/bedrooms, which are perfect for a 2 person apartment.

name: MM:NT Berlin Lab - Everything

Whether it's for a work event or the ultimate staycation filled with work, play, and relaxation, MM:NT Everything has you covered. description: Bright, and minimalist artist's room with a queen-sized bed in the heart of Berlin's Centre. The location is absolutely unbeatable, - you have a serene setting with all the peace and quiet you could want, green to both sides of the apartment and no loud traffic. At the same time, you are only a few steps away from rich heritages and historical landmarks, such as the Wall Memorial & the Mauerpark. Great bars and restaurants are just around the corner & getting around is effortless

name: Bright room with balcony, sustainable lifestyle
description:
I rent out my room in our shared apartment while I am away on business. So you live with my flatmate Roxanne: she is an amazing artist, currently working at an startup in Xberg.
Sometimes, like right now, we also rent out our beautiful balcony room.
It is a typical Berlin old building, right in the heart of Kreuzberg 36! With a lot of love for the detail.
NOTE:
1. In this WG reside two pet tigers, so you should appreciate their presence.
2. Our kitchen is #glutenfree and mostly #vegan!

name: Sunny private room in vibrant Neukolln
description: Stumbling distance to the bars and cafes of lively Weserstraße, 5 to 7min to U-bahn station Rathaus Neukolln, and just a few minutes to the canal and all its loveliness. Tempelhofer Feld is a just a short bus or bike ride away. It's really a perfect location. The apartment itself is spacious, simply but beautifully fitted out, and filled with natural light. A truly lovely place in the heart of Neukolln.

name: Private Room in a Beautiful Altbau in Neukölln
description: The apartment is located in the heart of Neukölln, with the nearest U-Bahn Station just a 3-minute walk away. This convenient location offers plenty to do in the neighborhood but it also offers easy access to the other parts of the city. My partner and I live in the apartment as well. Common spaces such as living room, bathroom and kitchen are shared with us.

name: Zentral und gemütlich. Eigener Balkon.
description: Creatively and lovingly furnished apartment in the heart of Berlin, popular attractions, gastronomy, culture, theatre, events, events, grocery stores, bakeries, shopping centres and shops in the immediate vicinity and within walking distance or 5 minutes by car, including Checkpoint Charly, Brandenburg Gate, Potsdamer Platz, Alexander Platz and much more.

A comfortable room in a flat . Metro Adenauerplatz, Train S Charlottenburg, busses 109,129, 119,110, X10
A little shower/ toilet combination. NO BIG COOKING. Supermarket, cheap imbiss, cafes, restaurants, everything very close. Elevator, 4th floor left! NO LATE CHECK in after 21:00!
Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf. Very central,guaguas ,Café,market, nearby subway!
Small private bathroom

Our Urban Garden Lofts have a spacious terrace and enough space for a long or short stay in Berlin .

The Urban Garden Loft is located on the ground floor and has a walk-in shower and bathtub.

In the middle of the backyards, you can sleep here quietly and comfortably while the colorful hustle and bustle of Berlin passes by on the street.

description: My street is a quiet alcove but at its end are the immaculate parks and gardens of the Schloss Charlottenburg with lush jogging and biking paths stretched around the Spree.  There are oodles of supermarkets within walking distance and an outdoor weekly market around the corner.  The bus, U-bahn, and ring are all 5-10 minutes by foot.  The deep greens of Tiergarten, Volkspark Jungfernheide, and Forst Grunewald are a long walk or a short bus ride away.

name: Spacious room in Neukölln
description: Located in the up and coming Neuköllner Schillerkiez, this room is a great starting point to discover all Berlin has to offer.

name: Central Space in Berlin Kreuzberg
description:
Hi there! We live in a spacious 2 floor apartment in the exciting Bergmann Kiez, Berlin Kreuzberg. Floor and bathroom, as well as my sleeping room is downstairs. The huge living room and open kitchen is at the second floor. That space is all yours!

We will be on x-mas vacation from 22nd of decembre on, so you‘ll have the apartment all to yourself;) Only our sleeping room will be locked and can‘t be used by the guests. You can sleep on our comfy sleeping couch.

Enjoy!

name: Cozy Room in the Center

name: Beautiful room in Schöneberg with a balcony
description:

Please be aware of the stairs you will have to take on the way to the room. I guess the room is not suitable for a wheelchair.

You can also rent a city-bike from me if you like.

Looking forward to meet you!

We offer a room with a shared bathroom on the second floor of our house. The room is 15 sqm big and has a single bed (90 cm * 2,00 m), a wardrobe, a desk and a wonderful view overlooking the garden.

The guest house is located in the Dharma Mati, a Tibetan Buddhist center of Rigpa in the heart of the Berlin West. There is a haven of peace in the middle of lively Berlin city life. Behind the walls of the officer's casino built in 1885, the guest house invites you to linger.
A shrine room is open to those interested to visit, meditate and linger.

description:
A spacious, beautiful and charismatic apartment with wooden floors and high ceilings. There’s a big shared garden and nearby parks. A big modern bathroom with tub, the kitchen is a work in progress but has all you need.

Public transport is easily accessible and plenty of nice bars, cafes and restaurants in the area.

You’ll share the 95 m2 apartment with me, Ella from London. Happy to give you tips for the area.

Important to note: no central heating, but electric heater available in the room

Experience the rare opportunity to live in the historic "Kirche am Hohenzollernplatz" in the heart of Berlin. Your apartment offers more than just a place to stay - it's a chance to be part of living history, the timeless beauty and heritage of one of Berlin's most famous landmarks.
The leafy square in front of the building with its water fountain will wake you up to the sounds of nature. At the weekend, the soothing sounds of the church lend a breathtaking magic.

In walking distance you have great restaurants, bars and cafés in every direction and with the areas around Kastanienallee and Rosenthaler Straße endless possibilities to go shopping in more alternative shops.

Our apartment is located in Moabit which is a relaxed but central area.
Located at the Ringbahn you can get pretty much everywhere in Berlin (especially Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg, Tiergarten!) very quickly. It's perfect for sightseers, congress visitors (we're close to Messe Nord/Süd ICC, Charité Campus Virchow/Mitte), couples & everyone who wants to experience berlin local life. During European football championship our place is really convenient in terms of connection to the stadium.

name: Modern central flat in Berlin Mitte
description: Our nice small flat is located in Berlin Mitte, in Wedding, it is the north part of Berlin. Public transport is in the walk distance of 5 to 7 minutes to the Underground Station. In only 10 Minutes you reach the city center for example Friedrichstraße. The flat is ideal for singles or couples.

name: Nice spacious room in Berlin Friedrichshain
description: The flat is located in the trendy district Friedrichshain. All places of interest can be reached very conveniently by public transport, various tramway-lines stop right in front of the building. You can reach the nightclubs at the riverside in 10 Minutes, a nice and huge public park is right across the street, where you can go running, play beach volleyball or go to the open air cinema in the evening. Also a lot of nice cafes, bars and restaurants are located in this district, just ask me :)

name: Moderne Unterkunft im Berliner Wedding
description: Beautiful, cozy apartment  for up to 2 people in a good location invites you to a short trip to Berlin.

name: Apartment in peaceful area 10 min. from Center
description:
We are ideally located, comfortable and safe. We're a 2 min. walk to the S-Bahn/Regional Train and then a 10 min. trip to the City Center. Quiet and beautiful area. Very comfortable mattress that forms to your body. Full kitchen, living and dining area.!

If you want a home away from home, this is the place!

name: Gemütliches Apartment in Friedrichshain
description:
I am abroad for work reasons and therefore rent out my room in my shared apartment. (Clothes are still being put away).
The apartment is located in Friedrichshain near Boxi and Ostkreuz and has a very good connection to the U-Bahn [subway], S-Bahn [suburban train] and tram.
Kitchenette and bathroom are fully equipped, and you can use everything.

Shopping and Spätis are numerous in the area (e.g. Edeka)

name: Spacious Room in the Heart of Berlin
description:
Our flat is located in Friedrichshain, the touristic heart of Berlin.
The flat is situated in a pre WWII residential building which allows you a real charming Berlin experience.
The room is 30m² has TV, Wifi a PS 4 and you can make use of the small but sunny balcony :)
The bathroom has a bathtub and a normal shower, moreover, you are welcome to use the washing machine and the fully equipped and extremely cozy eat-in kitchen :)

name: Zimmer in WG in Berlin-Lichtenberg
description:
Hey !
My room in Berlin-Lichtenberg is for rent in the time from 15.03. to 30./31.03.
It's located near S+U-Lichtenberg with perfect connections via Train (every 1-2 minute) and Bus+Tram

name: Nice Room in Berlin Neukölln
description: A cosy room in the middle of Berlin Neukölln, with balcony and vintage forniture. You will share the big kitchen (with washing machine and dishwasher) with 3 young and friendly  students. The flat is in the second floor of a real quiet street

name: zentraler, sehr ruhiger Altbau
description:
You will be staying in a renovated old building apartment near the main train station in the district of Moabit.
The room has wooden floorboards, high ceilings and a large window facing the courtyard.
You have a bed and a couch, which also offers space to sleep.

name: 2 Rooms at Schlesi – Green Kreuzberg Vibes
description:
Light and green Berlin rooms!
We are renting out our two green rooms in our shared flat.
The rooms are connected, one is a bedroom (140cm bed) and the other a living room/studio equipped with a large fold out bed sofa, desk, stereo and loads of books.
If you have an allergy to dogs it might be wise to look further because we have adorable puppies.. ;)
Kitchen and Bathroom (with tub) are fully equipped and you share them with our two most likeable roommates.

name: Rustic Berlin | in our apartment | 2x2m bed
description:
If we will be on vacation, our apartment will be yours. We expect you to use everything with care, also if it's not the 4-star-season, it's our cozy rustic Berlin home ;)
Our place is a typical old Berlin apartment with old wooden floors and 3,8m high ceilings, directly at the subway station U Vinetastrasse, just 7-subway-min. away from the city center. We have tons of board games you could play with if you like and free coffee/tea. In Summer you could enjoy a wine/craft beer on our balcony.

name: Kreuzberg- super central- cosy huge room
description:
Super central - the perfect location to get to know Berlin. Bright spacious room, fully furnished - see pictures- in 77m² ground floor appartment, fully equiped kitchen (oven, stove, microwave) and spacious bathroom with bathtub and washing machine. You have your own entrance.

location:
5 min walking distance U3, U1 Prinzenstraße

name: cosy room  beautiful location near metro station
description:
your room is cosy about 12sqm with a window on the backyard so it's really quiet.

there's pretty much everything you might need in the kitchen and you can use whatever you want.

there is a double sized bed and I can provide a single mattress if you needed

name: Nice room in Neukölln
description:
Our place is located in Neukölln and is close to Kreuzberg, Treptower Park, Tempelhofer Feld and Friedrichshain.

You’ll love it because of the location as it's close to the hottest places in Berlin and a charming canal is just a few steps away.

The room is really cozy and the balcony is a sweet place to stay in a hot summer evening. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

name: Nice room in shared flat Alt-Moabit
description:
The room is a nice and quiet place on the first floor and the only room of the flat with plastering.
About the flat: We are a shared flat community of four interesting, young people who study in Berlin.
We are looking forward to you!

name: Cozy, fully furnished Studio apartment in Berlin
description:
Hello!
This studio apartment is fully furnished, with everything needed in the bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, sleeping, WiFi, etc.
Located on a quiet street in the heart of the city, between Friedrichshain and Lichtenberg.
There is a Netto supermarket right across the street and Aldi and Rewe supermarkets not far off.
Also close by is Frankfurter Allee, with the Shopping malls Ring Center 1 and 2
In 5-10 minutes walk is the U/S-Bahn.
Perfect for those coming on a short business or holiday trip.

name: Room with a cute balcony, close to Alexanderplatz
description:
A private room in a big 4-bedroom apartment with two bathrooms. The room has a cute little balcony attached to it, with a view of Planetarium (which looks magical in the evenings).
Guests are also welcome to use the kitchen.
Apartment is on the first floor.
Well connected with transportation, with possibility of reaching different parts of the city quickly. Alexanderplatz is only 6 tram stops away.

name: Cosy bedroom in Friedrichshain
description: My room is part of a two persons shared living. The flat is having a small balcony, a kitchen you can use and a bathroom. You can reach my place from Warschauerstr. (U12) and Ostkreuz (S41....) in about 10 min.

name: Cosy flat, top located in Berlin Mitte
description: Very nice, bright apartment with kitchen, logia and open living room on the 4th floor and located in Berlin Mitte in a prime location. Right in the house is a patisserie, next door the supermarket, bakery, organic market. Cafe's, bars and restaurants, parks, swimming pool, cinemas and many shops are nearby. Connection to public transport is optimal: Central Station (about 10 minutes by tram that stops at the front door), U-Bahn (about 5 min walk), S-Bahn (about 7 min walk).

description:
Hello Airbnb-ers,
I'm offering my room while I'm away on holiday - Hopefully it'll also be an enjoyable place for you to rest while visiting this amazing city.

name: Cozy quiet studio in Berlin
description:
Hi! My place is nice, cozy and fully furnished. Perfect for people coming to Berlin on short business trips or holidays. There’s a Netto supermarket right across and not far off is Aldi and Rewe. Frankfurter Allee is 5 minutes away and and the shopping malls Ring Center 1 and 2 are there. For those coming to partying, Warschauer Straße isn’t far off and the famous Simon-Dach-Straße too.
The apartment is less than 5-10 minutes walk from both U-bahn and S-bahn..

name: Nice Room in South-East Berlin
description: Lovely room with a double loft bed in a shared flat in the South-East part of Berlin. Transportation and grocery shops are just around the corner. Very easy to get to the city centre or the beautiful lake areas (Muggelsee).

name: Cozy & Antique Longstay Apartment
description: Our place is a large, bright and open apartment furnished with almost everything you need. A luxurious and antique style offers a royal and cozy atmosphere. name: Heart of Berlin-Kreuzberg
description:
Room in heart of Berlin Kreuzberg. Location great for exploring the city. Although in very lively Wrangelkiez area of Kreuzberg, still the is very quiet and peaceful.
Area is very well connected to all parts of Berlin and in walking distance of many clubs, East Side Gallery (Berlin Wall), restaurants, cafes and parks.
IMPORTANT: There is double bed in bedroom. For more than two guests, there is one side mattress.

description: At "Hotel Helle Mitte" Berlin you will find an attractive value for money. For drivers who want to arrive with their car, we have paid parking spaces available (underground parking, 6€ per exit/night). Breakfast can be booked for €9.00 per person.

The rooms feature a contemporary industrial look, high ceilings and large windows, which welcome plenty of natural light. The condo includes high speed Wi-Fi and an ensuite bathroom with shower. The condo is located on the second floor of the building which is carefully designed with a collage of muted colors and interesting textures to create a homely yet inspiring atmosphere.

The apartment is conveniently situated less than 1km away from the official Berlin wall memorial, 1,9km towards the natural history museum and 2,2km to the Alexanderplatz.

please notice our flat is located in a lively neighborhood on a trafficked street and the elevated railway line is passing directly in front of our house, so don’t expect the room to be super quiet.

description: Welcome to our fine room in Berlin/Charlottenburg. The apartment is located in the immediate vicinity of Wilmersdorfer Str., one of the busiest streets in Berlin, which is full of restaurants, bars and shops. In just a few minutes you can reach the U-Bahn [subway] & S-Bahn [suburban train] and thus have a perfect connection to the public transport network. The room is comfortably furnished and offers everything you need for a comfortable stay. Looking forward to seeing you soon!

LOCATION:

description: The flat is centrally located near S Halensee (Ringbahn) and still very quiet and green. The Grunewald, the main recreational forest in Berlin, is 15 minutes away by foot. The flat is part of an old villa, the other flats are occupied by friends and family. There are three rooms and one large kitchen/livingroom combination (see pictures). It has been recently renovated. All equipment for kids is available. 20 minutes to Berlin-Mitte, 10 Minutes to Zoo, 10 Minutes with Taxi to Airport Tegel.

name: Minimal room in designer flat central berlin
description:
I'm renting out one of the rooms in my flat. It's a beautiful Altbau in Wedding in Berlin. It was built 1901 so there is wooden floor in every room and high ceilings.

It's a 3 room flat and you will be renting out the room furthest away from the other two. It's a quiet space and no sound from outside can be heard. I have blackout curtains so it will get really dark as well.

I'm working from home but just on my computer in the living room. This space can be used when I'm not working

name: Cozy Flat with balcony - Kiez feeling

Hey lovely people!
Me and my boyfriend are often traveling and in that time you can enjoy a nice place to stay while you visit Berlin! :)
It’s a shared flat, but our room is all yours, so are the shared rooms.

name: Beautiful Place | in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg

We live and work part time at home and prefer a quiet and respectful living together, therefore parties are not allowed. We have 2 sweet cats and a child (*Jan.2022). Kitchen is NOT shared!

Kick back and relax in this quiet, stylish space. Berlin - Friedrichshagen, close to the city yet idyllic on Lake Müggelsee. Diverse shopping and restaurants, S-Bahn station on foot 10 minutes, in 30 minutes in the city of Berlin.

Your room is cosy and quiet because it faces an inner courtyard.
Its suitable for a traveler that is looking for a small and simple yet homey place to sleep when visiting the city.

Newly renovated with a beautiful garden where you can enjoy some peace in the heart of the city. Here you can go in the garden of B!RGIT relax and in the bar of B!RGIT enjoy typical regional drinks.
It is important to us to pay attention to nature and ecology, so we only use products that meet these values. Our breakfast is rich in organic ingredients offering a healthy selection

name: Private room - Central location - Potsdamer Platz

Potsdamer Platz is within walking distance and every district can be reached in 15 minutes. Perfect location for a tourist weekend. When traveling I do a lot of air bnb myself and am happy to give you all tips, no matter whether cafes, restaurants or clubs. I am not at home over the turn of the year and so you would have the apartment all to yourself.

Hello,

My room is freshly built and very spacious.
A lot of things fit in and you have a very beautiful view of Karl-Marx-Allee.
The sun shines in all day and you always have light in the room.
The bed is huge and super comfortable and accommodating after a busy day/day of vacation.
The super central location is perfect for exploring Berlin. Restaurants and countless bars are available at Boxhagner Platz nearby.

Best regards

Here I, ageless young artist, live here, my guests from all over the world, when they are there, and 2 magical cats. Wi-Fi is free,  bathroom + kitchens shared use. We will meet in the kitchen which is for everyone. Nothing has to be possible.

This is my home, in the heart of Berlin’s queer scene, where things can be noisy at times, and you can enjoy adorable dinners and more.

The apartment is a completely private apartment. You only share the front door.
It is also very quiet because the apartment is so high. Friendly young neighborhood with nice bars and cafes right outside the front door. It is stylishly designed with antiques.
Not suitable for partying due to intolerant tenant underneath.
The studio is rather unsuitable for ambitious chefs.

description:
You're in the perfect spot to dive into Berlin's history combined with the vibrance of a young upcoming neighbourhood flair.
Enjoy this unique and tranquil getaway with kitchen and balcony. The building is on a tiny street near lake Weissensee next to a cute square, offering restaurants, shops and public transport connecting you Berlin wide (by tram 20 Min to Alexanderplatz).
The 4th floor apt has an elevator, and your bedroom a terrace and view to the back gardens.

description:

There are many shopping and nightlife options close by.
The room is very bright and there is a light bathroom and a small bright fitted kitchen that faces the courtyard side.
Good for couples or good friends!

name: Spacious Room in the Heart of Berlin
description: Welcome to the world-famous Kreuzberg district. The neighborhood is the ideal place for your authentic Berlin experience! Various restaurants, bars and cultural institutions are close to you. Your spacious and bright room in the heart of vibrant Kreuzberg offers the perfect blend of comfort and charm. Just outside the door, Görlitzer Park invites you to relax. If you need tips, I'll be happy to accompany you with my advice.

close to supermarket, bank,pharmacy,cinema

to Alexanderplatz,Mauerpark,Hackescher Markt,Rosenthaler Platz,,,,,,
ideal location for shopping, breakfast,games(children's Playground) to enjoy Berlin!

My livingroom is 19 m2 firnished with a comfortable sleeping coach perfect for two people (1,40x 2.00). Additionally i have an airmatrace. You can watch netflix and use the table to do some studys. A wallrobe is available for your clothes!

Small Castle in Little paradise

In the middle of the backyards, you can sleep here quietly and comfortably while the colorful hustle and bustle of Berlin passes by on the street.

Bus stop is right outside the door, S-bahn is less than ten minutes away and you reach both U6 and U9 in about 7 minutes by foot. Lovely street with cafes and bars!

And now for more than 20 years.
Here and in the neighboring district of Berlin Mitte, art, culture, gastronomy and nightlife flourish.

Very close to the Central Bus Station ZOB, Messe Berlin and the Olympic Stadium.
The two amazing parks Ruhwald and Brixplatz are perfect to have a walk, relax and enjoy the nature.

Weißensee is a clean, quiet, nice and comfortable district.
The apartment is warm in winter and cool in summer.
Here you can cook, chat and stay in peace. Everything is there. You just need your own toothbrush and clothes. The rest is available and can be used.
The wardrobe is empty and waiting for your stuff. In the kitchen there is space for your shopping

I'm renting out my lovely big and bright room with bay window in Prenzlauerberg while I'm on a holiday.

Room has a super high ceiling and a beautiful wooden floor and is facing south, meaning it's super bright during the day and in the evening you can watch the sunset from the couch in the bay window.

A 10 min walk to the Volkspark Friedrichshain and the m10 (stop is just a 2 min walk) will bring you directly to the famous Mauerpark and to lively Warschauerstrasse.

name: Comfortable Room near to the airport!
description:
The flat is nearby the underground station „Kurt-Schumacher Platz“.
There are a lot of public transportation options. There are also a lot of shops and groceries.
Around the flat are a few bars and a lot of options to have a meal.
You can reach the City Centre with the underground within 14 minutes.

name: 2 Rooms rooftop terrace Prenzlauer Berg Mauerpark

2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom in a big modern family flat (living room, kitchen and terrace shared) on 2 levels. Big terrace (40m2). Wonderful view.
Kastanienallee, Mauerpark, Kollwitzplatz, Alexanderplatz, Kulturbrauerei, flea market , little Boutiques, bars, restaurants and clubs around.
12 minutes tram from central station. Metro U2 Eberswalder Strasse is 5 minutes walk.
You will share the living room, kitchen and terrace with our family (sometime we have a dog with us)

IMPORTANT! We have two little cute cats, no freebies - so they will be in the apartment all the time. Please only ask the apartment if that's okay.

The apartment is located in the beautiful Kunger-Kiez, near the Spree, the Landwehrkanal, the Treptower and Görlitzer Park. Nice cafes and restaurants as well as different shops are within walking distance.

My apartment is located in the heart of Kreuzberg and is the ideal starting point to discover the area and still have a feel-good place to come back to.

name: quiet green place in Berlin-Friedrichshain
description:
From June 2023 you will enjoy the time in my own quiet apartment located in the central, hip district of Friedrichshain: New building with large garden in a quiet location, but in a few minutes you are right in the middle of lively Berlin - restaurants, bars, clubs (Berghain, Suicide Club, …) are not far away. 😊

You can stay in a very cozy guest room with a view of the garden and a private bathroom. There is a private parking space in the underground garage.

name: Nettes kleines Zimmer im Altbau Nähe Insbrucker Pl
description:
Just arrive with your suitcase and be at home. All costs are included in the price. TV, heating, electricity or internet.

You will rent a room of about 11 square meters in a bright well-cut 77 square meter apartment.


In your room there is a closet, (including bedding), a sleeping couch, TV Netflix included and a small desk.

The old building apartment has about 3 m high ceilings and the typical floorboard.

name: Hotel Comenius - Twin Double room (two double)
description: Twin Double Room: Our spacious Twin Double Room is the perfect choice for travelers who prefer separate sleeping options. This room has two comfortable double beds, making it ideal for friends, families or colleagues traveling together in Berlin. Enjoy the extra space and amenities this room has to offer and have a pleasant night in our hotel.

With a spacious layout, ample natural light, and a calming atmosphere, it's an ideal space for restful sleep. Perfectly blending city living with tranquility, this harmonious home awaits you.

Hi guys!

name: Cozy room in Wedding
description: The room is about 18qm big with a balcony. The apartment is located in a nice and quite street in Wedding close to the station Leopoldplatz (U6 + U7). You'll find shops and supermarkets as well as nice cafés and restaurants in the neighbourhood. You'll be sharing the apartment with me and my boyfriend so you can ask anytime if you have questions or need help with anything.

name: surprisingly different ~ Ku'damm Charlottenburg
description:
In the middle of the old Berlin West, directly on the sophisticated Kurfürstendamm, in a magnificent Berlin house from the Gründerzeit period. A retreat in the capital jungle: attention to detail and surprisingly differently, a familiar feeling is created here, called HENRI...

At home in a stately setting, everyone will find their favorite place to have breakfast, a drink, and a chat.

For Residents and Friends only!

name: Ruhiges Zimmer im Buddhistischen Zentrum
description:
The guest house is located in the Dharma Mati, a Tibetan Buddhist center of Rigpa in the heart of the Berlin West. There is a haven of peace in the middle of lively Berlin city life. Behind the walls of the officer's casino built in 1885, the guest house invites you to linger.
A shrine room is open to those interested to visit, meditate and linger.

name: Gemütliches großes Zimmer im Herzen Kreuzbergs
description:
In the
heart of Kreuzberg directly at Görlitzer Park is our beautiful old building apartment. The room is 25 square meters and it is located on the third floor of a charming old building apartment, with a large, fully equipped kitchen and bathroom with bathtub.
The apartment is very central - Görlitzer Bahnhof subway station as well as a bus stop (M29) are right outside the door - and there is no shortage of food and nightlife options!

name: Altbau, sonnig, malerisch
description: My accommodation is in the heart of the beautiful Schillerkiez and in the immediate vicinity of the Tempelhofer field. Your room is very bright and is located on the 4th floor, which makes it quiet. Whether the market on Saturday at Herrfurthplatz or shopping at the small stores - everything is in walking distance. The U8 can be reached in 2 minutes and there are many nice cafes, bars, clubs and restaurants to be discovered in the neighborhood.

name: Hotel the YARD, Premium Zimmer
description: A boutique hotel in the heart of Berlin! Where the geographical center of the capital is located – in the middle of Kreuzberg, nestled in a green idyll lies the Hotel the YARD. The inspiration for a green courtyard in the heart of a large metropolis came from Italy and this vision came true at the YARD. With the world's most famous garden architect Enzo Enea, a green retreat was created, an oasis in the middle of a central location.

description:
My home is really special, great for working from home and living. It's a maisonette flat connected with indoor staircase. Features:
- Very bright and balcony with a view over Berlin
- 2 bathrooms
- Great work from home setup - standing desk for homeoffice and also table downstairs, so 2 people can work in parallel
- Fastest internet available with Telekom (best provider in Germany)
- Modern kitchen
- Lots of beautiful plants

I’m usually not home when I sublet so the entire place is free

name: Four-Bedroom
description: Just 2 stops with the tramway or 15 minutes by foot from “Alexanderplatz”, the famous historic center of Berlin, lies our hotel in the vibrating “Greifswalder Straße” in the super-hip district “Prenzlauer Berg”. Despite this downtown location, our rooms are situated in a quiet backyard in a typical Berliner “Altbau” with lots of flair. Spread across five floors with shared bathrooms and lockable showers and toilets we offer you everything you need to get to know this metropole during your stay.

description:

Come and enjoy Berlin as pure, raw and beautiful as it can get!

name: Lulus Paradies
description: Cozy room for up to two people. The kitchen is fully equipped.

name: Bright Stylish Flat with Garden in Prenzlauer Berg
description:
Very comfortable flat with Wi-Fi, washing machine, and dishwasher well situated in Prenzlauer Berg only 1 minute by foot from Tram M10 and 5 minutes by foot from Tram M2.

It offers a living room/open kitchen, small garden area and a bedroom with a queen size bed for 2 people and a private bathroom.
We are often away so please contact us for any questions.

name: Private Double Room
description:
Base yourself in the heart of this awesome city at our famous hostel renowned for its lively atmosphere. With the added benefit of having the U-Bahn on our doorstep we provide the perfect location to connect you to the rest of the city.

At our famous onsite Belushi’s bar, where we host live DJs, live sports and epic parties, guests can enjoy exclusive drink deals and 25% off our awesome menu!

We offer free WiFi, a range of modern rooms & apartments, and a 24hr reception for your convenience.

You can use the kitchen to cook food (pots, frying pans are there), you’ll have a shelf in the fridge.

In the bathroom we have shampoo, shower gel and toothpaste for guests.

name: Studenten-WG in Kreuzkölln
description: With this special place, all the important points of contact are close, so planning your stay is easy. We live in the middle of the neighborhood in Kreuzkölln. Close to Hasenheide and Tempelhofer Feld. Your roommate Viktoria is open and fun, classic student flat!

name: Schönes Privatzimmer im Herzen von Friedrichshain
description: The room has a bed (1.40×2m) and is minimalist equipped. Otherwise, the apartment has an equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a bathtub.

name: Spacious and bright room in Kreuzkölln
description: 30m2 room in a bright cosy flatshare in a renovated old building. The apartment has high ceilings, a balcony, a big kitchen, two bathrooms with a washing machine and a spacious living room. Located in a nice green street of Neukölln full of restaurants, bars and cafés.

name: Funky spacious room in the heart of Neukölln
description:
I'm renting out my cute room in the heart of Neukölln! The room is pure happiness! It has a BIG double-bed (180 cm width), a cosy kitchen with a dining table and all the stuff you need for cooking and enjoying! You can chill out like a champion in the living room, balcony... (also at the Tempelhofer Feld which is 5 min from here)! There is a bath tub for cold days!
I live with 2 wonderful flatmates, 2 cis women, which are pretty often on the go, so the flat is quiet.

name: Cosy room in shared flat
description: Hi everyone! I would like to offer you my small but very cosy and clean room in Berlin-Grünau. You will share the flat (living room, kitchen, bathroom) with my lovely flatmate Stefanie but you might have it for your own most of the time. If you are looking for a quiet place to stay and to feel at home I would be happy to host you :)

name: Big Room in Big WG - feel at home in Berlin
description:
You can stay in my big room and my Big shared flat with lovely flat mates.
There is a lot of space in this room, is specially good for students, musicians or artists

name: Great Room in the center of Berlin
description: Berlin center!!!

name: The Room
description: Have you ever wondered how it would feel like to be a „berliner kiezlegende“ (legendary person ruling the neighborhood)? Well, this might be just the place to get a proper impression of East-Berlin. Supermarkets, excellent 24/7 Public Transportation, Bars, Clubs and everything - all close by in walking distance. Should need any recommendations, we‘re happy to help. One male, one female flat mate.

name: Lovely flat in Prenzlauer Berg
description: Sunny flat in Prenzlauer Berg near Volkspark Friedrichshain and Eberswalder Straße! It´s a 2-room-70m2 flat with balcony. It's next to public transport like M10, Ringbahn, and bus. You will find everything you need like supermarkets, bars and nightlife around the corner. Alexanderplatz can be reached in 10 min.

name: Lightfull Studio Appartment
description:
Welcome to my studio appartment.
It is in a very nice area with lots of Cafes and restaurants. Public transport very close. It is very calm in the backyard with nice neighbours. You can easily reach different spots in Berlin. You could also stay with 2 people.
Welcome to my bright studio apartment.
Lots of cafes and restaurants are nearby. Public transport is easily accessible nearby. The apartment is in the back house quietly with nice neighbors.

description: Beautiful room in a huge apartment right in the heart of Kreuzberg. Right next to Görlitzer Park and the Kanal. Lots of cozy Cafés, Bars and Restaurants are just around the corner.

name: nice room in Friedrichshain
description:
Hello,

offer a nice bright room here in the heart of Friedrichshain until we find a new roommate.

The apartment is located near the subway line 5 (Frankfurter Tor), tram M10 and S-Bahn (Storkower Straße). Eastside gallery and Warschauer Straße/Revaler Straße/raw is within walking distance.

During your stay, my roommate and I will also live in the apartment.

Looking forward to looking forward to nice guests :)

LG Basti

description: Spacious, bright room filled with plants. Apartment situated on a quiet street  in sort after Neukolln right between Maybach Ufer Kanal and Gorlitzer Park. Plenty of restaurants and bars around the area. Easy access to public transport.
